1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%12%%And they shall take all the instruments of ministry, with which they minister in the sanctuary, and put them in a cloth of blue, and cover them with a covering of badgers' skins, and shall put them on a bar.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%13%%And they shall take away the ashes from the altar, and spread a purple cloth upon it:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%14%%And they shall put upon it all its vessels, with which they minister about it, even the censers, the flesh-hooks, and the shovels, and the basins, all the vessels of the altar; and they shall spread upon it a covering of badgers' skins, and put to it its staffs.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%15%%And when Aaron and his sons have made an end of covering the sanctuary, and all the vessels of the sanctuary, as the camp is to move forward; after that, the sons of Kohath shall come to bear it: but they shall not touch any holy thing, lest they die. These things are the burden of the sons of Kohath in the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%16%%And to the office of Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest pertain the oil for the light, and the sweet incense, and the daily meat-offering, and the anointing oil, and the oversight of all the tabernacle, and of all that is in it, in the sanctuary, and in its vessels.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%17%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%18%%Cut ye not off the tribe of the families of the Kohathites from among the Levites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%19%%But thus do to them, that they may live, and not die, when they approach to the most holy things: Aaron and his sons shall go in, and appoint them every one to his service and to his burden:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%20%%But they shall not go in to see when the holy things are covered, lest they die.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%21%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%22%%Take also the sum of the sons of Gershon, throughout the house of their fathers, by their families;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%23%%From thirty years old and upward until fifty years old shalt thou number them; all that enter in to perform the service, to do the work in the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%24%%This is the service of the families of the Gershonites, to serve, and for burdens:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%25%%And they shall bear the curtains of the tabernacle, and the tabernacle of the congregation, its covering, and the covering of the badgers' skins that is above upon it, and the hanging for the door of the tabernacle of the congregation,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%26%%And the hangings of the court, and the hanging for the door of the gate of the court, which is by the tabernacle and by the altar round about, and their cords, and all the instruments of their service, and all that is made for them: so shall they serve.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%27%%At the appointment of Aaron and his sons shall be all the service of the sons of the Gershonites, in all their burdens, and in all their service: and ye shall appoint to them in charge all their burdens.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%28%%This is the service of the families of the sons of Gershon in the tabernacle of the congregation: and their charge shall be under the hand of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%29%%As for the sons of Merari, thou shalt number them after their families, by the house of their fathers;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%30%%From thirty years old and upward even to fifty years old shalt thou number them, every one that entereth into the service, to do the work of the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%31%%And this is the charge of their burden, according to all their service in the tabernacle of the congregation; the boards of the tabernacle, and its bars, and its pillars, and its sockets,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%32%%And the pillars of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords, with all their instruments, and with all their service: and by name ye shall reckon the instruments of the charge of their burden.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%33%%This is the service of the families of the sons of Merari, according to all their service, in the tabernacle of the congregation, under the hand of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%34%%And Moses and Aaron and the chief of the congregation numbered the sons of the Kohathites after their families, and after the house of their fathers,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%35%%From thirty years old and upward even to fifty years old, every one that entereth into the service, for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%36%%And those that were numbered of them by their families were two thousand seven hundred and fifty.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%37%%These were they that were numbered of the families of the Kohathites, all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the commandment of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%38%%And those that were numbered of the sons of Gershon, throughout their families, and by the house of their fathers,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%39%%From thirty years old and upward even to fifty years old, every one that entereth into the service, for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%40%%Even those that were numbered of them, throughout their families, by the house of their fathers, were two thousand and six hundred and thirty.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%41%%These are they that were numbered of the families of the sons of Gershon, of all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the commandment of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%42%%And those that were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, throughout their families, by the house of their fathers,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%43%%From thirty years old and upward even to fifty years old, every one that entereth into the service for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%44%%Even those that were numbered of them after their families, were three thousand and two hundred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%45%%These are those that were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%46%%All those that were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron and the chief of Israel numbered, after their families, and after the house of their fathers,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%47%%From thirty years old and upward even to fifty years old, every one that came to do the service of the ministry, and the service of the burden in the tabernacle of the congregation,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%48%%Even those that were numbered of them, were eight thousand and five hundred and eighty.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%4%%49%%According to the commandment of the LORD they were numbered by the hand of Moses, every one according to his service, and according to his burden: thus were they numbered by him, as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%2%%Command the children of Israel, that they put out of the camp every leper, and every one that hath an issue, and whoever is defiled by the dead:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%3%%Both male and female shall ye put out, without the camp shall ye put them; that they defile not their camps, in the midst of which I dwell.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%4%%And the children of Israel did so, and put them out without the camp: as the LORD spoke to Moses, so did the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%5%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%6%%Speak to the children of Israel, When a man or woman shall commit any sin that men commit, to do a trespass against the LORD, and that person shall be guilty;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%7%%Then they shall confess their sin which they have done: and he shall recompense his trespass with the principal of it, and add to it the fifth part of it, and give it to him against whom he hath trespassed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%8%%But if the man shall have no kinsman to recompense the trespass to, let the trespass be recompensed to the LORD, even to the priest; besides the ram of the atonement, by which an atonement shall be made for him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%9%%And every offering of all the holy things of the children of Israel, which they bring to the priest, shall be his.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%10%%And every man's hallowed things shall be his: whatever any man giveth to the priest, it shall be his.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%11%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%12%%Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, If any man's wife shall go astray, and commit a trespass against him,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%13%%And a man shall lie with her carnally, and it shall be hid from the eyes of her husband, and be kept close, and she be defiled, and there be no witness against her, neither she be taken with the manner;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%14%%And the spirit of jealousy shall come upon him, and he be jealous of his wife, and she be defiled: or if the spirit of jealousy shall come upon him, and he be jealous of his wife, and she be not defiled:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%15%%Then shall the man bring his wife to the priest, and he shall bring her offering for her, the tenth part of an ephah of barley-meal; he shall pour no oil upon it, nor put frankincense upon it; for it is an offering of jealousy, an offering of memorial, bringing iniquity to remembrance.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%16%%And the priest shall bring her near, and set her before the LORD:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%17%%And the priest shall take holy water in an earthen vessel; and of the dust that is on the floor of the tabernacle the priest shall take, and put it into the water:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%18%%And the priest shall set the woman before the LORD, and uncover the woman's head, and put the offering of memorial in her hands, which is the jealousy-offering: and the priest shall have in his hand the bitter water that causeth the curse:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%19%%And the priest shall charge her by an oath, and say to the woman, If no man hath lain with thee, and if thou hast not gone aside to uncleanness with another instead of thy husband, be thou free from this bitter water that causeth the curse:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%20%%But if thou hast gone aside to another instead of thy husband, and if thou art defiled, and some man hath lain with thee besides thy husband:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%21%%Then the priest shall charge the woman with an oath of cursing, and the priest shall say to the woman, The LORD make thee a curse and an oath among thy people, when the LORD doth make thy thigh to perish, and thy belly to swell;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%22%%And this water that causeth the curse shall go into thy bowels, to make thy belly to swell, and thy thigh to perish. And the woman shall say, Amen, amen.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%23%%And the priest shall write these curses in a book, and he shall blot them out with the bitter water:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%24%%And he shall cause the woman to drink the bitter water that causeth the curse: and the water that causeth the curse shall enter into her, and become bitter.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%25%%Then the priest shall take the jealousy-offering out of the woman's hand, and shall wave the offering before the LORD, and offer it upon the altar:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%26%%And the priest shall take a handful of the offering, even the memorial of it, and burn it upon the altar, and afterward shall cause the woman to drink the water.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%27%%And when he hath made her to drink the water, then it shall come to pass, that, if she is defiled, and hath done trespass against her husband, that the water that causeth the curse shall enter into her, and become bitter, and her belly shall swell, and her thigh shall perish: and the woman shall be a curse among her people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%28%%And if the woman is not defiled, but is clean; then she shall be free, and shall conceive seed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%29%%This is the law of jealousies, when a wife goeth astray to another instead of her husband, and is defiled;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%30%%Or when the spirit of jealousy cometh upon him, and he is jealous over his wife, and shall set the woman before the LORD, and the priest shall execute upon her all this law.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%5%%31%%Then shall the man be guiltless from iniquity, and this woman shall bear her iniquity.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%2%%Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, When either man or woman shall separate themselves to vow a vow of a Nazarite, to separate themselves to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%3%%He shall separate himself from wine and strong drink, and shall drink no vinegar of wine, or vinegar of strong drink, neither shall he drink any liquor of grapes, nor eat moist grapes, or dried.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%4%%All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine-tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%5%%All the days of the vow of his separation there shall no razor come upon his head: until the days shall be fulfilled, in which he separateth himself to the LORD, he shall be holy, and shall let the locks of the hair of his head grow.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%6%%All the days that he separateth himself to the LORD, he shall come at no dead body.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%7%%He shall not make himself unclean for his father, or for his mother, for his brother, or for his sister, when they die: because the consecration of his God is upon his head.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%8%%All the days of his separation he is holy to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%9%%And if any man shall die very suddenly by him, and he hath defiled the head of his consecration; then he shall shave his head in the day of his cleansing, on the seventh day shall he shave it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%10%%And on the eighth day he shall bring two turtles, or two young pigeons, to the priest, to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%11%%And the priest shall offer the one for a sin-offering, and the other for a burnt-offering, and make an atonement for him, for that he sinned by the dead, and shall hallow his head that same day.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%12%%And he shall consecrate to the LORD the days of his separation, and shall bring a lamb of the first year for a trespass-offering: but the days that were before shall be lost, because his separation was defiled.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%13%%And this is the law of the Nazarite, when the days of his separation are fulfilled: he shall be brought to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%14%%And he shall offer his offering to the LORD, one he-lamb of the first year without blemish for a burnt-offering, and one ewe-lamb of the first year without blemish for a sin-offering, and one ram without blemish for peace-offerings,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%15%%And a basket of unleavened bread, cakes of fine flour mingled with oil, and wafers of unleavened bread anointed with oil, and their meat-offering and their drink-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%16%%And the priest shall bring them before the LORD, and shall offer his sin-offering, and his burnt-offering:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%17%%And he shall offer the ram for a sacrifice of peace-offerings to the LORD, with the basket of unleavened bread: the priest shall offer also his meat-offering, and his drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%18%%And the Nazarite shall shave the head of his separation at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall take the hair of the head of his separation, and put it in the fire which is under the sacrifice of the peace-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%19%%And the priest shall take the boiled shoulder of the ram, and one unleavened cake out of the basket, and one unleavened wafer, and shall put them upon the hands of the Nazarite, after the hair of his separation is shaven:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%20%%And the priest shall wave them for a wave-offering before the LORD: this is holy for the priest, with the wave-breast, and heave-shoulder: and after that, the Nazarite may drink wine.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%21%%This is the law of the Nazarite who hath vowed, and of his offering to the LORD for his separation, besides that which his hand shall get: according to the vow which he vowed, so he must do after the law of his separation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%22%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%23%%Speak to Aaron and to his sons, saying, On this wise ye shall bless the children of Israel, saying to them,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%24%%The LORD bless thee, and keep thee:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%25%%The LORD make his face to shine upon thee, and be gracious to thee:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%26%%The LORD lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%6%%27%%And they shall put my name upon the children of Israel, and I will bless them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%1%%And it came to pass on the day that Moses had fully set up the tabernacle, and had anointed it, and sanctified it, and all its instruments, both the altar and all its vessels, and had anointed them, and sanctified them;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%2%%That the princes of Israel, heads of the house of their fathers, who were the princes of the tribes, and were over them that were numbered, offered:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%3%%And they brought their offering before the LORD, six covered wagons, and twelve oxen; a wagon for two of the princes, and for each one an ox: and they brought them before the tabernacle.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%4%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%5%%Take it of them, that they may be to perform the service of the tabernacle of the congregation; and thou shalt give them to the Levites, to every man according to his service.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%6%%And Moses took the wagons and the oxen, and gave them to the Levites.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%9%%But to the sons of Kohath he gave none: because the service of the sanctuary belonging to them was that they should bear upon their shoulders.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%10%%And the princes offered for dedicating the altar in the day that it was anointed, even the princes offered their offering before the altar.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%84%%This was the dedication of the altar (in the day when it was anointed) by the princes of Israel: twelve chargers of silver, twelve silver bowls, twelve spoons of gold:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%85%%Each charger of silver weighing a hundred and thirty shekels, each bowl seventy: all the silver vessels weighed two thousand and four hundred shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%86%%The golden spoons were twelve, full of incense, weighing ten shekels apiece, after the shekel of the sanctuary: all the gold of the spoons was a hundred and twenty shekels.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%87%%All the oxen for the burnt-offering were twelve bullocks, the rams twelve, the lambs of the first year twelve, with their meat-offering: and the kids of the goats for sin-offering, twelve.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%88%%And all the oxen for the sacrifice of the peace-offerings were twenty and four bullocks, the rams sixty, the he-goats sixty, the lambs of the first year sixty. This was the dedication of the altar, after it was anointed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%7%%89%%And when Moses had entered into the tabernacle of the congregation to speak with him, then he heard the voice of one speaking to him from off the mercy-seat that was upon the ark of testimony, from between the two cherubim: and he spoke to him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%2%%Speak to Aaron, and say to him, When thou lightest the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light over against the candlestick.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%3%%And Aaron did so; he lighted the lamps of it over against the candlestick, as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%4%%And this work of the candlestick was of beaten gold, to its shaft, to the flowers of it, was beaten work: according to the pattern which the LORD had showed Moses, so he made the candlestick.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%5%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%6%%Take the Levites from among the children of Israel, and cleanse them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%7%%And thus shalt thou do to them, to cleanse them: Sprinkle water of purifying upon them, and let them shave all their flesh, and let them wash their clothes, and so make themselves clean.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%8%%Then let them take a young bullock with his meat-offering, even fine flour mingled with oil, and another young bullock shalt thou take for a sin-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%9%%And thou shalt bring the Levites before the tabernacle of the congregation: and thou shalt convene the whole assembly of the children of Israel:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%10%%And thou shalt bring the Levites before the LORD: and the children of Israel shall put their hands upon the Levites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%11%%And Aaron shall offer the Levites before the LORD for an offering of the children of Israel, that they may execute the service of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%12%%And the Levites shall lay their hands upon the heads of the bullocks: and thou shalt offer the one for a sin-offering, and the other for a burnt-offering, to the LORD, to make an atonement for the Levites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%13%%And thou shalt set the Levites before Aaron, and before his sons, and offer them for an offering to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%14%%Thus shalt thou separate the Levites from among the children of Israel: and the Levites shall be mine.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%15%%And after that shall the Levites go in to perform the service of the tabernacle of the congregation: and thou shalt cleanse them, and offer them for an offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%16%%For they are wholly given to me from among the children of Israel; instead of such as open every womb, even instead of the first-born of all the children of Israel, have I taken them to me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%17%%For all the first born of the children of Israel are mine, both man and beast: on the day that I smote every first-born in the land of Egypt I sanctified them for myself.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%18%%And I have taken the Levites for all the first-born of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%19%%And I have given the Levites as a gift to Aaron and to his sons from among the children of Israel, to do the service of the children of Israel in the tabernacle of the congregation, and to make an atonement for the children of Israel: that there may be no plague among the children of Israel, when the children of Israel come nigh to the sanctuary.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%20%%And Moses, and Aaron, and all the congregation of the children of Israel, did to the Levites according to all that the LORD commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did the children of Israel to them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%21%%And the Levites were purified, and they washed their clothes; and Aaron offered them as an offering before the LORD; and Aaron made an atonement for them to cleanse them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%22%%And after that went the Levites in to perform their service in the tabernacle of the congregation before Aaron, and before his sons: as the LORD had commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did they to them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%23%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%24%%This is it that belongeth to the Levites: from twenty and five years old and upward they shall go in to wait upon the service of the tabernacle of the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%25%%And from the age of fifty years they shall cease waiting upon the service of it, and shall serve no more:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%8%%26%%But shall minister with their brethren in the tabernacle of the congregation, to keep the charge, and shall do no service. Thus shalt thou do to the Levites concerning their charge.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the first month of the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%2%%Let the children of Israel also keep the passover at its appointed season.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%3%%In the fourteenth day of this month, at evening, ye shall keep it in its appointed season: according to all its rites, and according to all its ceremonies, shall ye keep it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%4%%And Moses spoke to the children of Israel, that they should keep the passover.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%5%%And they kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the first month at evening in the wilderness of Sinai: according to all that the LORD commanded Moses, so did the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%6%%And there were certain men, who were defiled by the dead body of a man, that they could not keep the passover on that day: and they came before Moses and before Aaron on that day:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%7%%And those men said to him, We are defiled by the dead body of a man: why are we kept back, that we may not offer an offering of the LORD in its appointed season among the children of Israel?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%8%%And Moses said to them, Stand still, and I will hear what the LORD will command concerning you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%9%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%10%%Speak to the children of Israel, saying, If any man of you or of your posterity shall be unclean by reason of a dead body, or be in a journey afar off, yet he shall keep the passover to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%11%%The fourteenth day of the second month at evening, they shall keep it, and eat it with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%12%%They shall leave none of it to the morning, nor break any bone of it: according to all the ordinances of the passover they shall keep it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%13%%But the man that is clean, and is not in a journey, and forbeareth to keep the passover, even the same soul shall be cut off from among his people: because he brought not the offering of the LORD in its appointed season, that man shall bear his sin.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%14%%And if a stranger shall sojourn among you, and will keep the passover to the LORD; according to the ordinance of the passover, and according to the manner of it, so shall he do: ye shall have one ordinance both for the stranger, and for him that was born in the land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%15%%And on the day that the tabernacle was erected the cloud covered the tabernacle, namely, the tent of the testimony: and at evening there was upon the tabernacle as it were the appearance of fire, until the morning.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%16%%So it was always; the cloud covered it by day, and the appearance of fire by night.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%17%%And when the cloud was taken up from the tabernacle, then after that the children of Israel journeyed: and in the place where the cloud abode, there the children of Israel pitched their tents.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%18%%At the commandment of the LORD the children of Israel journeyed, and at the commandment of the LORD they encamped: as long as the cloud abode upon the tabernacle they rested in their tents.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%19%%And when the cloud tarried long upon the tabernacle many days, then the children of Israel kept the charge of the LORD, and journeyed not.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%20%%And so it was, when the cloud was a few days upon the tabernacle; according to the commandment of the LORD they abode in their tents, and according to the commandment of the LORD they journeyed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%21%%And so it was, when the cloud abode from evening to the morning, and that the cloud was taken up in the morning, then they journeyed: whether it was by day or by night that the cloud was taken up, they journeyed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%22%%Or whether it was two days, or a month, or a year, that the cloud tarried upon the tabernacle, remaining upon it, the children of Israel abode in their tents, and journeyed not: but when it was taken up, they journeyed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%9%%23%%At the commandment of the LORD they rested in the tents, and at the commandment of the LORD they journeyed: they kept the charge of the LORD, at the commandment of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%2%%Make thee two trumpets of silver; of a whole piece shalt thou make them; that thou mayest use them for the calling of the assembly, and for the journeying of the camps.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%3%%And when they shall blow with them, all the assembly shall assemble themselves to thee at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%4%%And if they blow but with one trumpet, then the princes, who are heads of the thousands of Israel, shall assemble themselves to thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%5%%When ye blow an alarm, then the camps that lie on the east parts shall go forward.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%6%%When ye blow an alarm the second time, then the camps that lie on the south side shall take their journey: they shall blow an alarm for their journeys.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%7%%But when the congregation is to be convened, ye shall blow, but ye shall not sound an alarm.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%8%%And the sons of Aaron, the priests, shall blow with the trumpets; and they shall be to you for an ordinance for ever throughout your generations.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%9%%And if ye go to war in your land against the enemy that oppresseth you, then ye shall blow an alarm with the trumpets; and ye shall be remembered before the LORD your God, and ye shall be saved from your enemies.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%10%%Also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye shall blow with the trumpets over your burnt-offerings, and over the sacrifices of your peace-offerings; that they may be to you for a memorial before your God: I am the LORD your God.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%11%%And it came to pass on the twentieth day of the second month, in the second year, that the cloud was taken up from off the tabernacle of the testimony.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%12%%And the children of Israel took their journeys from the wilderness of Sinai; and the cloud rested in the wilderness of Paran.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%13%%And they first took their journey according to the commandment of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%14%%In the first place went the standard of the camp of the children of Judah according to their armies: and over his host was Nahshon the son of Amminadab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%15%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Issachar was Nethaneel the son of Zuar.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%16%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Zebulun was Eliab the son of Helon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%17%%And the tabernacle was taken down; and the sons of Gershon and the sons of Merari moved forward, bearing the tabernacle.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%18%%And the standard of the camp of Reuben moved forward according to their armies: and over his host was Elizur the son of Shedeur.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%19%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Simeon was Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%20%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Gad was Eliasaph the son of Deuel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%21%%And the Kohathites moved forward, bearing the sanctuary: and the other set up the tabernacle against they came.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%22%%And the standard of the camp of the children of Ephraim moved forward according to their armies: and over his host was Elishama the son of Ammihud.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%23%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Manasseh was Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%24%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Benjamin was Abidan the son of Gideoni.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%25%%And the standard of the camp of the children of Dan moved forward, which was the rear-ward of all the camps throughout their hosts: and over his host was Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%26%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Asher was Pagiel the son of Ocran.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%27%%And over the host of the tribe of the children of Naphtali was Ahira the son of Enan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%28%%Thus were the journeyings of the children of Israel according to their armies, when they moved forward.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%29%%And Moses said to Hobab, the son of Raguel the Midianite, Moses's father-in-law, We are journeying to the place of which the LORD said, I will give it to you: come thou with us, and we will do thee good: for the LORD hath spoken good concerning Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%30%%And he said to him, I will not go; but I will depart to my own land, and to my kindred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%31%%And he said, Leave us not, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to encamp in the wilderness, and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%32%%And it shall be, if thou wilt go with us, yea, it shall be, that what goodness the LORD shall do to us, the same will we do to thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%33%%And they departed from the mount of the LORD three days' journey: and the ark of the covenant of the LORD went before them in the three days' journey, to seek a resting-place for them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%34%%And the cloud of the LORD was upon them by day, when they went out of the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%35%%And it came to pass, when the ark moved forward, that Moses said, Arise, LORD, and let thy enemies be scattered; and let them that hate thee flee before thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%10%%36%%And when it rested, he said, Return, O LORD, to the many thousands of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%1%%And when the people complained, it displeased the LORD; and the LORD heard it: and his anger was kindled; and the fire of the LORD burnt among them, and consumed them that were in the uttermost parts of the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%2%%And the people cried to Moses; and when Moses prayed to the LORD, the fire was quenched.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%3%%And he called the name of the place Taberah; because the fire of the LORD burnt among them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%4%%And the mixed multitude that was among them fell to lusting: and the children of Israel also wept again, and said, Who shall give us flesh to eat?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%5%%We remember the fish which we ate in Egypt freely: the cucumbers, and the melons, and the leeks, and the onions, and the garlic:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%6%%But now our soul is dried away; there is nothing at all, besides this manna, before our eyes.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%7%%And the manna was as coriander-seed, and the color of it as the color of bdellium.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%8%%And the people went about, and gathered it and ground it in mills, or beat it in a mortar, and baked it in pans, and made cakes of it: and the taste of it was as the taste of fresh oil.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%9%%And when the dew fell upon the camp in the night, the manna fell upon it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%10%%Then Moses heard the people weeping throughout their families, every man in the door of his tent: and the anger of the LORD was kindled greatly: Moses also was displeased.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%11%%And Moses said to the LORD, Why hast thou afflicted thy servant? and why have I not found favor in thy sight, that thou layest the burden of all this people upon me?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%12%%Have I conceived all this people? have I begotten them, that thou shouldest say to me, Carry them in thy bosom, as a nursing-father beareth the sucking child, to the land which thou sworest to their fathers?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%13%%Whence should I have flesh to give to all this people? for they weep to me, saying, Give us flesh, that we may eat.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%14%%I am not able to bear all this people alone, because it is too heavy for me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%15%%And if thou dealest thus with me, kill me, I pray thee, out of hand, if I have found favor in thy sight; and let me not see my wretchedness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%16%%And the LORD said to Moses, Gather to me seventy men of the elders of Israel, whom thou knowest to be the elders of the people, and officers over them; and bring them to the tabernacle of the congregation, that they may stand there with thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%17%%And I will come down and talk with thee there: and I will take of the spirit which is upon thee, and will put it upon them; and they shall bear the burden of the people with thee, that thou mayest not bear it thyself alone.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%18%%And say thou to the people, Sanctify yourselves against to-morrow, and ye shall eat flesh; for ye have wept in the ears of the LORD, saying, Who shall give us flesh to eat? for it was well with us in Egypt: therefore the LORD will give you flesh, and ye shall eat.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%19%%Ye shall not eat one day, nor two days, nor five days, neither ten days, nor twenty days;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%20%%But even a whole month, until it shall come out at your nostrils, and it be lothsome to you; because ye have despised the LORD who is among you, and have wept before him, saying, Why came we forth out of Egypt?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%21%%And Moses said, The people among whom I am, are six hundred thousand footmen; and thou hast said, I will give them flesh, that they may eat a whole month.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%22%%Shall the flocks and the herds be slain for them, to suffice for them? or shall all the fish of the sea be gathered for them, to suffice for them?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%23%%And the LORD said to Moses, Is the LORD'S hand shortened? thou shalt see now whether my word shall come to pass to thee, or not.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%24%%And Moses went out, and told the people the words of the LORD, and gathered the seventy men of the elders of the people, and set them around the tabernacle.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%25%%And the LORD came down in a cloud, and spoke to him, and took of the spirit that was upon him, and gave it to the seventy elders: and it came to pass, that when the spirit rested upon them; they prophesied, and did not cease.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%26%%But there remained two of the men in the camp, the name of the one was Eldad, and the name of the other Medad: and the spirit rested upon them, and they were of them that were described, but went not out to the tabernacle: and they prophesied in the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%27%%And there ran a young man, and told Moses, and said, Eldad and Medad do prophesy in the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%28%%And Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of Moses, one of his young men, answered and said, My lord, Moses, forbid them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%29%%And Moses said to him, Enviest thou for my sake? I would that all the LORD'S people were prophets, and that the LORD would put his spirit upon them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%30%%And Moses withdrew into the camp, he and the elders of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%31%%And there went forth a wind from the LORD, and brought quails from the sea, and let them fall by the camp, as it were a day's journey on this side, and as it were a day's journey on the other side, around the camp, and as it were two cubits high upon the face of the earth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%32%%And the people stood up all that day, and all that night, and all the next day, and they gathered the quails: he that gathered least gathered ten homers: and they spread them all abroad for themselves around the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%33%%And while the flesh was yet between their teeth, ere it was chewed, the wrath of the LORD was kindled against the people, and the LORD smote the people with a very great plague.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%34%%And he called the name of that place Kibroth-hattaavah: because there they buried the people that lusted.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%11%%35%%And the people journeyed from Kibroth-hattaavah to Hazeroth: and abode at Hazeroth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%1%%And Miriam and Aaron spoke against Moses because of the Cushite woman whom he had married: for he had married a Cushite woman.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%2%%And they said, Hath the LORD indeed spoke only by Moses? hath he not spoke also by us? And the LORD heard it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%3%%(Now the man Moses was very meek, above all the men who were upon the face of the earth.)
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%4%%And the LORD spoke suddenly to Moses, and to Aaron, and to Miriam, Come out ye three to the tabernacle of the congregation. And they three came out.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%5%%And the LORD came down in the pillar of the cloud, and stood in the door of the tabernacle, and called Aaron and Miriam: and they both came forth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%6%%And he said, Hear now my words: If there is a prophet among you, I the LORD will make myself known to him in a vision, and will speak to him in a dream.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%7%%My servant Moses is not so, who is faithful in all my house.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%8%%With him will I speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of the LORD shall he behold: why then were ye not afraid to speak against my servant Moses?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%9%%And the anger of the LORD was kindled against them; and he departed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%10%%And the cloud departed from off the tabernacle; and behold, Miriam became leprous, white as snow: and Aaron looked upon Miriam, and behold, she was leprous.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%11%%And Aaron said to Moses, Alas, my lord, I beseech thee, lay not the sin upon us, in which we have done foolishly, and in which we have sinned.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%12%%Let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed at the time of his birth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%13%%And Moses cried to the LORD, saying, Heal her now, O God, I beseech thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%14%%And the LORD said to Moses, If her father had but spit in her face, should she not be ashamed seven days? let her be shut out from the camp seven days, and after that let her be received again.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%15%%And Miriam was shut out from the camp seven days: and the people journeyed not till Miriam was brought in again.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%12%%16%%And afterward the people removed from Hazeroth, and encamped in the wilderness of Paran.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%2%%Send thou men, that they may search the land of Canaan, which I give to the children of Israel: of every tribe of their fathers shall ye send a man, every one a ruler among them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%3%%And Moses, by the commandment of the LORD, sent them from the wilderness of Paran: all those men were heads of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%4%%And these were their names: Of the tribe of Reuben, Shammua the son of Zaccur.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%5%%Of the tribe of Simeon, Shaphat the son of Hori.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%6%%Of the tribe of Judah, Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%7%%Of the tribe of Issachar, Igal the son of Joseph.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%8%%Of the tribe of Ephraim, Oshea the son of Nun.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%9%%Of the tribe of Benjamin, Palti the son of Raphu.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%10%%Of the tribe of Zebulun, Gaddiel the son of Sodi.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%11%%Of the tribe of Joseph, namely, of the tribe of Manassah, Gaddi the son of Susi.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%12%%Of the tribe of Dan, Ammiel the son of Gemalli.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%13%%Of the tribe of Asher, Sethur the son of Michael.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%14%%Of the tribe of Naphtali, Nahbi the son of Vophsi.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%15%%Of the tribe of Gad, Geuel the son of Machi.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%16%%These are the names of the men whom Moses sent to explore the land. And Moses called Oshea the son of Nun Jehoshua.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%17%%And Moses sent them to explore the land of Canaan, and said to them, Go ye up this way southward, and ascend the mountain:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%18%%And see the land, what it is; and the people that dwell therein, whether they are strong or weak, few or many;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%19%%And what the land is that they dwell in, whether it is good or bad; and what cities they are that they dwell in, whether in tents, or in strong holds;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%20%%And what the land is, whether it is fertile or barren, whether there is wood in it, or not. And be ye of good courage, and bring of the fruit of the land. Now the time was the time of the first ripe grapes.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%21%%So they went up, and searched the land from the wilderness of Zin to Rehob, as men come to Hamath.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%22%%And they ascended by the south, and came to Hebron; where Ahiman, Sheshai, and Talmai, the children of Anak, were. (Now Hebron was built seven years before Zoan in Egypt.)
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%23%%And they came to the brook of Eshcol, and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes, and they bore it between two upon a staff; and they brought of the pomegranates, and of the figs.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%24%%The place was called the brook Eshcol, because of the cluster of grapes which the children of Israel cut down from thence.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%25%%And they returned from exploring the land after forty days.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%26%%And they went and came to Moses, and to Aaron, and to all the congregation of the children of Israel, to the wilderness of Paran, to Kadesh; and brought back word to them, and to all the congregation, and showed them the fruit of the land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%27%%And they told him, and said, We came to the land whither thou sentest us, and surely it floweth with milk and honey; and this is the fruit of it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%28%%Nevertheless, the people are strong that dwell in the land, and the cities are walled, and very great: and moreover, we saw the children of Anak there.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%29%%The Amalekites dwell in the land of the south: and the Hittites, and the Jebusites, and the Amorites, dwell in the mountains: and the Canaanites dwell by the sea, and by the coast of Jordan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%30%%And Caleb stilled the people before Moses, and said, Let us go up at once, and possess it; for we are well able to overcome it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%31%%But the men that went up with him said, We are not able to go up against the people; for they are stronger than we.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%32%%And they brought an evil report of the land which they had searched to the children of Israel, saying, The land through which we have passed to search it, is a land that eateth up its inhabitants; and all the people that we saw in it, are men of a great stature.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%13%%33%%And there we saw the giants, the sons of Anak, who come of the giants: and we were in our own sight as grasshoppers, and so we were in their sight.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%1%%And all the congregation lifted up their voice, and cried; and the people wept that night.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%2%%And all the children of Israel murmured against Moses and against Aaron: and the whole congregation said to them, O that we had died in the land of Egypt! or O that we had died in this wilderness!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%3%%And why hath the LORD brought us to this land, to fall by the sword, that our wives and our children should be a prey? were it not better for us to return into Egypt?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%4%%And they said one to another, Let us make a captain, and let us return into Egypt.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%5%%Then Moses and Aaron fell on their faces before all the assembly of the congregation of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%6%%And Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, who were of them that searched the land, rent their clothes:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%7%%And they spoke to all the company of the children of Israel, saying, The land, which we passed through to search it, is an exceeding good land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%8%%If the LORD delighteth in us, then he will bring us into this land, and give it to us; a land which floweth with milk and honey.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%9%%Only rebel not ye against the LORD, neither fear ye the people of the land; for they are bread for us: their defense has departed from them, and the LORD is with us: fear them not.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%10%%But all the congregation required to stone them with stones: and the glory of the LORD appeared in the tabernacle of the congregation before all the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%11%%And the LORD said to Moses, How long will this people provoke me? and how long will it be ere they believe me, for all the signs which I have shown among them?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%12%%I will smite them with the pestilence, and disinherit them, and will make of thee a greater nation and mightier than they.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%13%%And Moses said to the LORD, Then the Egyptians will hear it, (for thou broughtest up this people in thy might from among them;)
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%14%%And they will tell it to the inhabitants of this land: for they have heard that thou LORD art among this people, that thou LORD art seen face to face, and that thy cloud standeth over them, and that thou goest before them, by day-time in a pillar of a cloud, and in a pillar of fire by night.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%15%%Now if thou shalt kill all this people as one man, then the nations which have heard the fame of thee will speak, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%16%%Because the LORD was not able to bring this people into the land which he swore to them, therefore he hath slain them in the wilderness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%17%%And now, I beseech thee, let the power of my Lord be great, according as thou hast spoken, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%18%%The LORD is long-suffering, and of great mercy, forgiving iniquity and transgression, and by no means clearing the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children to the third and fourth generation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%19%%Pardon, I beseech thee, the iniquity of this people according to the greatness of thy mercy, and as thou hast forgiven this people, from Egypt, even until now.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%20%%And the LORD said, I have pardoned according to thy word:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%21%%But as truly as I live, all the earth shall be filled with the glory of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%22%%Because all those men who have seen my glory, and my miracles, which I did in Egypt and in the wilderness, and have tempted me now these ten times, and have not hearkened to my voice;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%23%%Surely they shall not see the land which I swore to their fathers, neither shall any of them that provoked me see it:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%24%%But my servant Caleb, because he had another spirit with him, and hath followed me fully, him will I bring into the land into which he went; and his seed shall possess it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%25%%(Now the Amalekites, and the Canaanites dwelt in the valley.) To-morrow turn you, and pass into the wilderness, by the way of the Red sea.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%26%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%27%%How long shall I bear with this evil congregation, which murmur against me? I have heard the murmurings of the children of Israel, which they murmur against me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%28%%Say to them, As truly as I live, saith the LORD, as ye have spoken in my ears, so will I do to you:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%29%%Your carcasses shall fall in this wilderness; and all that were numbered of you, according to your whole number, from twenty years old and upward, who have murmured against me,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%30%%Doubtless ye shall not come into the land concerning which I swore to make you dwell therein, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%31%%But your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, them will I bring in, and they shall know the land which ye have despised.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%32%%But as for you, your carcasses, they shall fall in this wilderness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%33%%And your children shall wander in the wilderness forty years, and bear your lewd deeds, until your carcasses shall be wasted in the wilderness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%34%%After the number of the days in which ye searched the land, even forty days (each day for a year) shall ye bear your iniquities, even forty years, and ye shall know my breach of promise.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%35%%I the LORD have said, I will surely do it to all this evil congregation, that are gathered against me: in this wilderness, they shall be consumed, and there they shall die.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%36%%And the men whom Moses sent to search the land, who returned, and made all the congregation to murmur against him, by bringing a slander upon the land,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%37%%Even those men that brought the evil report upon the land, died by the plague before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%38%%But Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, who were of the men that went to search the land, lived still.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%39%%And Moses told these sayings to all the children of Israel: and the people mourned greatly.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%40%%And they rose early in the morning, and ascended to the top of the mountain, saying, Lo, we are here, and will go up to the place which the LORD hath promised: for we have sinned.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%41%%And Moses said, Why now do ye transgress the commandment of the LORD? but it shall not prosper.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%42%%Go not up, for the LORD is not among you; that ye be not smitten before your enemies.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%43%%For the Amalekites and the Canaanites are there before you, and ye shall fall by the sword: because ye are turned away from the LORD, therefore the LORD will not be with you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%44%%But they presumed to go up to the hill-top: nevertheless the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and Moses, departed not out of the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%14%%45%%Then the Amalekites came down, and the Canaanites which dwelt in that hill, and smote them, and discomfited them, even to Hormah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%2%%Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, When ye shall have come into the land of your habitations, which I give to you,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%3%%And will make an offering by fire to the LORD, a burnt-offering, or a sacrifice in performing a vow, or in a free-will-offering, or in your solemn feasts, to make a sweet savor to the LORD, of the herd, or of the flock:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%4%%Then shall he that offereth his offering to the LORD bring a meat-offering of a tenth part of flour mingled with the fourth part of a hin of oil.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%5%%And the fourth part of a hin of wine for a drink-offering shalt thou prepare with the burnt-offering or sacrifice, for one lamb.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%6%%Or for a ram, thou shalt prepare for a meat-offering two tenth parts of flour mingled with the third part of a hin of oil.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%7%%And for a drink-offering thou shalt offer the third part of a hin of wine, for a sweet savor to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%8%%And when thou preparest a bullock for a burnt-offering, or for a sacrifice in performing a vow, or peace-offerings to the LORD:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%9%%Then shall he bring with a bullock a meat-offering of three tenth parts of flour mingled with half a hin of oil.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%10%%And thou shalt bring for a drink-offering half a hin of wine, for an offering made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%11%%Thus shall it be done for one bullock, or for one ram, or for a lamb, or a kid.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%12%%According to the number that ye shall prepare, so shall ye do to every one according to their number.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%13%%All that are born in the country shall do these things after this manner, in offering an offering made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%14%%And if a stranger shall sojourn with you, or whoever shall be among you in your generations, and will offer an offering made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD; as ye do, so he shall do.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%15%%One ordinance shall be both for you of the congregation, and also for the stranger that sojourneth with you, an ordinance for ever in your generations: as ye are, so shall the stranger be before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%16%%One law and one manner shall be for you, and for the stranger that sojourneth with you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%17%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%18%%Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, When ye come into the land whither I bring you,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%19%%Then it shall be, that when ye eat of the bread of the land, ye shall offer up a heave-offering to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%20%%Ye shall offer a cake of the first of your dough for a heave-offering: as ye do the heave-offering of the threshing-floor, so shall ye heave it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%21%%Of the first of your dough ye shall give to the LORD a heave-offering in your generations.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%22%%And if ye have erred, and not observed all these commandments which the LORD hath spoken to Moses,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%23%%Even all that the LORD hath commanded you by the hand of Moses, from the day that the LORD commanded Moses, and henceforward among your generations;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%24%%Then it shall be, if aught shall be committed by ignorance without the knowledge of the congregation, that all the congregation shall offer one young bullock for a burnt-offering, for a sweet savor to the LORD, with his meat-offering, and his drink-offering, according to the manner, and one kid of the goats for a sin-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%25%%And the priest shall make an atonement for all the congregation of the children of Israel, and it shall be forgiven them; for it is ignorance: and they shall bring their offering, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD, and their sin-offering before the LORD, for their ignorance:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%26%%And it shall be forgiven all the congregation of the children of Israel, and the stranger that sojourneth among them; seeing all the people were in ignorance.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%27%%And if any soul shall sin through ignorance, then he shall bring a she-goat of the first year for a sin-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%28%%And the priest shall make an atonement for the soul that sinneth ignorantly, when he sinneth by ignorance before the LORD, to make an atonement for him; and it shall be forgiven him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%29%%Ye shall have one law for him that sinneth through ignorance, both for him that is born among the children of Israel, and for the stranger that sojourneth among them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%30%%But the soul that doeth aught presumptuously, whether he be born in the land, or a stranger, the same reproacheth the LORD; and that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%31%%Because he hath despised the word of the LORD, and hath broken his commandment, that soul shall utterly be cut off; his iniquity shall be upon him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%32%%And while the children of Israel were in the wilderness, they found a man that gathered sticks upon the sabbath-day.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%33%%And they that found him gathering sticks brought him to Moses and Aaron, and to all the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%34%%And they put him in custody, because it was not declared what should be done to him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%35%%And the LORD said to Moses, The man shall surely be put to death: all the congregation shall stone him with stones without the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%36%%And all the congregation brought him without the camp, and stoned him with stones, and he died; as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%37%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%38%%Speak to the children of Israel, and bid them that they make them fringes on the borders of their garments throughout their generations, and that they put upon the fringe of the borders a ribin of blue:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%39%%And it shall be to you for a fringe, that ye may look upon it, and remember all the commandments of the LORD, and do them; and that ye seek not after your own heart and your own eyes, after which ye use to go astray:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%40%%That ye may remember, and do all my commandments, and be holy to your God.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%15%%41%%I am the LORD your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, to be your God: I am the LORD your God.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%1%%Now Korah, the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, and Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, and On, the son of Peleth, sons of Reuben, took men:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%2%%And they rose up before Moses, with certain of the children of Israel, two hundred and fifty princes of the assembly, famous in the congregation, men of renown:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%3%%And they assembled themselves against Moses and against Aaron, and said to them, Ye take too much upon you, seeing all the congregation are holy, every one of them, and the LORD is among them: why then do ye raise yourselves above the congregation of the LORD?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%4%%And when Moses heard it, he fell upon his face:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%5%%And he spoke to Korah and to all his company, saying, Even to-morrow the LORD will show who are his, and who is holy; and will cause him to come near to him: even him whom he hath chosen will he cause to come near to him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%6%%This do; Take you censers, Korah, and all his company;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%7%%And put fire in them, and put incense in them before the LORD to-morrow: and it shall be that the man whom the LORD doth choose, he shall be holy: ye take too much upon you, ye sons of Levi.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%8%%And Moses said to Korah, Hear, I pray you, ye sons of Levi:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%9%%Seemeth it but a small thing to you, that the God of Israel hath separated you from the congregation of Israel, to bring you near to himself to do the service of the tabernacle of the LORD, and to stand before the congregation to minister to them?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%10%%And he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren the sons of Levi with thee: and seek ye the priesthood also?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%11%%For which cause both thou and all thy company are assembled against the LORD: and what is Aaron, that ye murmur against him?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%12%%And Moses sent to call Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab: who said, We will not come up:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%13%%Is it a small thing that thou hast brought us out of a land that floweth with milk and honey, to kill us in the wilderness, except thou make thyself altogether a prince over us?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%14%%Moreover, thou hast not brought us into a land that floweth with milk and honey, or given us inheritance of fields and vineyards: wilt thou put out the eyes of these men? we will not come up.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%15%%And Moses was very wroth, and said to the LORD, Respect not thou their offering: I have not taken one ass from them, neither have I hurt one of them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%16%%And Moses said to Korah, Be thou and all thy company before the LORD, thou, and they, and Aaron, to-morrow:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%17%%And take every man his censer, and put incense in them, and bring ye before the LORD every man his censer, two hundred and fifty censers; thou also and Aaron each of you his censer.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%18%%And they took every man his censer, and put fire in them, and laid incense on them, and stood in the door of the tabernacle of the congregation with Moses and Aaron.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%19%%And Korah gathered all the congregation against them to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and the glory of the LORD appeared to all the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%20%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%21%%Separate yourselves from among this congregation, that I may consume them in a moment.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%22%%And they fell upon their faces, and said, O God, the God of the spirits of all flesh, shall one man sin, and wilt thou be wroth with all the congregation?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%23%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%24%%Speak to the congregation, saying, Withdraw yourselves from about the tabernacle of Korah, Dathan, and Abiram.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%25%%And Moses rose up, and went to Dathan and Abiram; and the elders of Israel followed him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%26%%And he spoke to the congregation, saying, Depart, I pray you, from the tents of these wicked men, and touch nothing of theirs, lest ye be consumed in all their sins.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%27%%So they withdrew from the tabernacle of Korah, Dathan, and Abiram, on every side: and Dathan and Abiram came out, and stood in the door of their tents, and their wives, and their sons, and their little children.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%28%%And Moses said, by this ye shall know that the LORD hath sent me to do all these works: for I have not done them of my own mind.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%29%%If these men shall die the common death of all men, or if they be visited after the visitation of all men; then the LORD hath not sent me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%30%%But if the LORD shall make a new thing, and the earth shall open her mouth, and swallow them up, with all that appertain to them, and they go down quick into the pit; then ye shall understand that these men have provoked the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%31%%And it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these words, that the ground cleaved asunder that was under them:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%32%%And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their houses, and all the men that appertained to Korah, and all their goods.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%33%%They, and all that appertained to them went down alive into the pit, and the earth closed upon them: and they perished from among the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%34%%And all Israel that were round about them, fled at the cry of them: for they said, Lest the earth swallow us up also.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%35%%And there came out a fire from the LORD, and consumed the two hundred and fifty men that offered incense.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%36%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%37%%Speak to Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, that he take up the censers out of the burning, and scatter thou the fire yonder; for they are hallowed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%38%%The censers of these sinners against their own souls, let them make them broad plates for a covering of the altar: for they offered them before the LORD, therefore they are hallowed: and they shall be a sign to the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%39%%And Eleazar the priest took the brazen censers, with which they that were burnt had offered; and they were made broad plates for a covering of the altar:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%40%%To be a memorial to the children of Israel, that no stranger, who is not of the seed of Aaron, should come near to offer incense before the LORD; that he may not be as Korah, and as his company: as the LORD said to him by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%41%%But on the morrow all the congregation of the children of Israel murmured against Moses and against Aaron, saying, Ye have killed the people of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%42%%And it came to pass when the congregation was gathered against Moses and against Aaron, that they looked towards the tabernacle of the congregation: and behold, the cloud covered it, and the glory of the LORD appeared.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%43%%And Moses and Aaron came before the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%44%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%45%%Remove from among this congregation, that I may consume them as in a moment. And they fell upon their faces.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%46%%And Moses said to Aaron, Take a censer, and put fire in it from off the altar, and put on incense, and go quickly to the congregation, and make an atonement for them: for there is wrath gone out from the LORD; the plague is begun.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%47%%And Aaron took as Moses commanded, and ran into the midst of the congregation; and behold, the plague was begun among the people: and he put on incense, and made an atonement for the people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%48%%And he stood between the dead and the living; and the plague was stayed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%49%%Now they that died in the plague were fourteen thousand and seven hundred, besides them that died about the matter of Korah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%16%%50%%And Aaron returned to Moses at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and the plague was stayed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%2%%Speak to the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of their fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers, twelve rods: write thou every man's name upon his rod.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%3%%And thou shalt write Aaron's name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%4%%And thou shalt lay them in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%5%%And it shall come to pass, that the man's rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, by which they murmur against you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%6%%And Moses spoke to the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers' houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%7%%And Moses laid the rods before the LORD in the tabernacle of witness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%8%%And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi had budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%9%%And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD to all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%10%%And the LORD said to Moses, Bring Aaron's rod again, before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%11%%And Moses did so: as the LORD commanded him, so did he.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%12%%And the children of Israel spoke to Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%17%%13%%Whoever approacheth the tabernacle of the LORD shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%1%%And the LORD said to Aaron, Thou and thy sons and thy father's house with thee shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary: and thou and thy sons with thee shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%2%%And thy brethren also of the tribe of Levi, the tribe of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined to thee, and minister to thee: but thou and thy sons with thee shall minister before the tabernacle of witness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%3%%And they shall keep thy charge, and the charge of all the tabernacle: only they shall not come nigh the vessels of the sanctuary and the altar, that neither they, nor ye also, die.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%4%%And they shall be joined to thee, and keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation, for all the service of the tabernacle: and a stranger shall not come nigh to you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%5%%And ye shall keep the charge of the sanctuary, and the charge of the altar: that there be no wrath any more upon the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%6%%And I, behold, I have taken your brethren the Levites from among the children of Israel: to you they are given as a gift for the LORD, to do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%7%%Therefore thou and thy sons with thee shall keep your priest's office for every thing of the altar, and within the vail; and ye shall serve: I have given your priest's office to you as a service of gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%8%%And the LORD spoke to Aaron, Behold, I also have given thee the charge of my heave-offerings of all the hallowed things of the children of Israel; to thee have I given them by reason of the anointing, and to thy sons, by an ordinance for ever.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%9%%This shall be thine of the most holy things reserved from the fire: every oblation of theirs, every meat-offering of theirs, and every sin-offering of theirs, and every trespass-offering of theirs, which they shall render to me, shall be most holy for thee and for thy sons.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%10%%In the most holy place shalt thou eat it; every male shall eat it: it shall be holy to thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%11%%And this is thine; the heave-offering of their gift, with all the wave-offerings of the children of Israel: I have given them to thee, and to thy sons, and to thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%12%%All the best of the oil, and all the best of the wine, and of the wheat, the first-fruits of them which they shall offer to the LORD, them have I given to thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%13%%And whatever is first ripe in the land, which they shall bring to the LORD, shall be thine; every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%14%%Every thing devoted in Israel shall be thine.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%15%%Every thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh, which they bring to the LORD, whether of men or beast, shall be thine: nevertheless, the first born of man shalt thou surely redeem, and the firstling of unclean beasts shalt thou redeem.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%16%%And those that are to be redeemed from a month old shalt thou redeem, according to thy estimation, for the money of five shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary, which is twenty gerahs.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%17%%But the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a goat, thou shalt not redeem; they are holy: thou shalt sprinkle their blood upon the altar, and shalt burn their fat for an offering made by fire, for a sweet savor to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%18%%And the flesh of them shall be thine, as the wave-breast and as the right shoulder are thine
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%19%%All the heave-offerings of the holy things, which the children of Israel offer to the LORD, have I given to thee, and to thy sons and thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before the LORD to thee and to thy seed with thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%20%%And the LORD spoke to Aaron, Thou shalt have no inheritance in their land, neither shalt thou have any part among them: I am thy part and thy inheritance among the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%21%%And behold, I have given the children of Levi all the tenth in Israel for an inheritance, for their service which they serve, even the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%22%%Neither must the children of Israel henceforth come nigh the tabernacle of the congregation, lest they bear sin, and die.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%23%%But the Levites shall do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation, and they shall bear their iniquity: It shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations, that among the children of Israel they have no inheritance.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%24%%But the tithes of the children of Israel, which they offer as a heave-offering to the LORD, I have given to the Levites to inherit: therefore I have said to them, Among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%25%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%26%%Thus speak to the Levites, and say to them, When ye take of the children of Israel the tithes which I have given you from them for your inheritance, then ye shall offer up a heave-offering of it for the LORD, even a tenth part of the tithe.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%27%%And this your heave-offering shall be reckoned to you, as though it were the corn of the threshing-floor, and as the fullness of the wine-press.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%28%%Thus ye also shall offer a heave-offering to the LORD of all your tithes which ye receive of the children of Israel; and ye shall give of them the LORD'S heave-offering to Aaron the priest.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%29%%Out of all your gifts ye shall offer every heave-offering of the LORD, of all the best of it, even its hallowed part out of it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%30%%Therefore thou shalt say to them, When ye have heaved from it the best of it, then it shall be counted to the Levites as the increase of the threshing-floor, and as the increase of the wine-press.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%31%%And ye shall eat it in every place, ye and your households: for it is your reward for your service in the tabernacle of the congregation.
