1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%18%%32%%And ye shall bear no sin by reason of it, when ye have heaved from it the best of it: neither shall ye pollute the holy things of the children of Israel, lest ye die.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%2%%This is the ordinance of the law which the LORD hath commanded, saying, Speak to the children of Israel, that they bring thee a red heifer without spot, in which is no blemish, and upon which never came a yoke:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%3%%And ye shall give her to Eleazar the priest, that he may bring her forth without the camp, and one shall slay her before his face:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%4%%And Eleazar the priest shall take of her blood with his finger, and sprinkle of her blood directly before the tabernacle of the congregation seven times:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%5%%And one shall burn the heifer in his sight; her skin, and her flesh, and her blood, with her dung, shall he burn:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%6%%And the priest shall take cedar-wood, and hyssop, and scarlet, and cast it into the midst of the burning of the heifer.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%7%%Then the priest shall wash his clothes, and he shall bathe his flesh in water, and afterward he shall come into the camp, and the priest shall be unclean until the evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%8%%And he that burneth her shall wash his clothes in water, and bathe his flesh in water, and shall be unclean until the evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%9%%And a man that is clean shall gather the ashes of the heifer, and lay them without the camp in a clean place, and it shall be kept for the congregation of the children of Israel, for a water of separation: it is a purification for sin.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%10%%And he that gathereth the ashes of the heifer shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the evening: and it shall be to the children of Israel, and to the stranger that sojourneth among them, for a statute for ever.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%11%%He that toucheth the dead body of any man shall be unclean seven days.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%12%%He shall purify himself with it on the third day, and on the seventh day he shall be clean: but if he shall not purify himself the third day, then the seventh day he shall not be clean.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%13%%Whoever toucheth the dead body of any man that is dead, and purifieth not himself, defileth the tabernacle of the LORD; and that soul shall be cut off from Israel: because the water of separation was not sprinkled upon him, he shall be unclean; his uncleanness is yet upon him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%14%%This is the law, when a man dieth in a tent: all that come into the tent, and all that is in the tent, shall be unclean seven days.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%15%%And every open vessel, which hath no covering bound upon it, is unclean.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%16%%And whoever toucheth one that is slain with a sword in the open fields, or a dead body, or a bone of a man, or a grave, shall be unclean seven days.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%17%%And for an unclean person they shall take of the ashes of the burnt heifer of purification for sin, and running water shall be put to it in a vessel:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%18%%And a clean person shall take hyssop, and dip it in the water, and sprinkle it upon the tent, and upon all the vessels, and upon the persons that were there, and upon him that touched a bone, or one slain, or one dead, or a grave:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%19%%And the clean person shall sprinkle upon the unclean on the third day, and on the seventh day: and on the seventh day he shall purify himself, and wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and shall be clean at evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%20%%But the man that shall be unclean, and shall not purify himself, that soul shall be cut off from among the congregation, because he hath defiled the sanctuary of the LORD: the water of separation hath not been sprinkled upon him: he is unclean.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%21%%And it shall be a perpetual statute to them, that he that sprinkleth the water of separation shall wash his clothes; and he that toucheth the water of separation shall be unclean until the evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%19%%22%%And whatever the unclean person toucheth shall be unclean; and the soul that toucheth it shall be unclean until the evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%1%%Then came the children of Israel, even the whole congregation, into the desert of Zin in the first month; and the people abode in Kadesh; and Miriam died there, and was buried there.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%2%%And there was no water for the congregation: and they assembled themselves against Moses and against Aaron.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%3%%And the people chid with Moses, and spoke, saying, O that we had died when our brethren died before the LORD!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%4%%And why have ye brought the congregation of the LORD into this wilderness, that we and our cattle should die there?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%5%%And why have ye conducted us from Egypt, to bring us to this evil place? it is no place of seed, or of figs, or of vines, or of pomegranates; neither is there any water to drink.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%6%%And Moses and Aaron went from the presence of the assembly to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and they fell upon their faces: and the glory of the LORD appeared to them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%7%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%8%%Take the rod, and convene thou the assembly, thou, and Aaron thy brother, and speak ye to the rock before their eyes; and it shall give forth its water, and thou shalt bring forth to them water out of the rock: so thou shalt give drink to the congregation and their beasts.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%9%%And Moses took the rod from before the LORD, as he commanded him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%10%%And Moses and Aaron assembled the congregation before the rock, and he said to them, Hear now, ye rebels; must we fetch you water out of this rock?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%11%%And Moses lifted his hand, and with his rod he smote the rock twice: and the water came out abundantly, and the congregation drank, and their beasts also.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%12%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron, Because ye believed me not, to sanctify me in the eyes of the children of Israel, therefore ye shall not bring this congregation into the land which I have given them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%13%%This is the water of Meribah; because the children of Israel strove with the LORD, and he was sanctified in them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%14%%And Moses sent messengers from Kadesh to the king of Edom, Thus saith thy brother Israel, Thou knowest all the travail that hath befallen us:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%15%%How our fathers went down into Egypt, and we have dwelt in Egypt a long time; and the Egyptians afflicted us, and our fathers:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%16%%And when we cried to the LORD, he heard our voice, and sent an angel, and hath brought us forth from Egypt: and behold, we are in Kadesh, a city in the uttermost of thy border:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%17%%Let us pass, I pray thee, through thy country: we will not pass through the fields, or through the vineyards, neither will we drink of the water of the wells: we will go by the king's high-way, we will not turn to the right hand nor to the left, until we have passed thy borders.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%18%%And Edom said to him, Thou shalt not pass by me, lest I come out against thee with the sword.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%19%%And the children of Israel said to him, We will go by the highway: and if I and my cattle drink of thy water, then I will pay for it: I will only, without doing any thing else, go through on my feet.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%20%%And he said, Thou shalt not go through. And Edom came out against him with many people, and with a strong hand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%21%%Thus Edom refused to give Israel passage through his border: wherefore Israel turned away from him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%22%%And the children of Israel, even the whole congregation, journeyed from Kadesh, and came to mount Hor.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%23%%And the LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron in mount Hor, by the coast of the land of Edom, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%24%%Aaron shall be gathered to his people: for he shall not enter into the land which I have given to the children of Israel, because ye rebelled against my word at the water of Meribah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%25%%Take Aaron and Eleazar his son, and bring them up to mount Hor:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%26%%And strip Aaron of his garments, and put them upon Eleazar his son: and Aaron shall be gathered to his people, and shall die there.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%27%%And Moses did as the LORD commanded: and they ascended mount Hor in the sight of all the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%28%%And Moses stripped Aaron of his garments, and put them upon Eleazar his son; and Aaron died there on the top of the mount: and Moses and Eleazar came down from the mount.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%20%%29%%And when all the congregation saw that Aaron was dead, they mourned for Aaron thirty days, even all the house of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%1%%And when king Arad the Canaanite, who dwelt in the south, heard that Israel came by the way of the spies; then he fought against Israel, and took some of them prisoners.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%2%%And Israel vowed a vow to the LORD, and said, If thou wilt indeed deliver this people into my hand, then I will utterly destroy their cities.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%3%%And the LORD hearkened to the voice of Israel, and delivered up the Canaanites; and they utterly destroyed them and their cities: and he called the name of the place Hormah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%4%%And they journeyed from mount Hor by the way of the Red sea, to compass the land of Edom: and the soul of the people was much discouraged because of the way.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%5%%And the people spoke against God, and against Moses, Why have ye brought us out of Egypt to die in the wilderness? for there is no bread, neither is there any water; and our soul lotheth this light bread.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%6%%And the LORD sent fiery serpents among the people, and they bit the people; and many people of Israel died.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%7%%Therefore the people came to Moses, and said, We have sinned, for we have spoken against the LORD, and against thee; pray to the LORD, that he take away the serpents from us. And Moses prayed for the people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%8%%And the LORD said to Moses, Make thee a fiery serpent, and set it upon a pole: and it shall come to pass, that every one that is bitten, when he looketh upon it, shall live.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%9%%And Moses made a serpent of brass, and put it upon a pole, and it came to pass, that if a serpent had bitten any man, when he beheld the serpent of brass, he lived.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%10%%And the children of Israel moved forward, and pitched in Oboth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%11%%And they journeyed from Oboth, and pitched at Ije-abarim, in the wilderness which is before Moab, towards the sun-rising.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%12%%From thence they removed, and pitched in the valley of Zared.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%13%%From thence they removed, and pitched on the other side of Arnon, which is in the wilderness that cometh out of the coasts of the Amorites: for Arnon is the border of Moab, between Moab and the Amorites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%14%%Wherefore it is said in the book of the wars of the LORD, What he did in the Red sea, and in the brooks of Arnon,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%15%%And at the stream of the brooks that goeth down to the dwelling of Ar, and lieth upon the border of Moab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%16%%And from thence they went to Beer: that is the well of which the LORD spoke to Moses, Assemble the people, and I will give them water.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%17%%Then Israel sung this song, Spring up, O well; sing ye to it:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%18%%The princes digged the well, the nobles of the people digged it, by the direction of the lawgiver, with their staffs. And from the wilderness they went to Mattanah:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%19%%And from Mattanah to Nahaliel: and from Nahaliel to Bamoth:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%20%%And from Bamoth in the valley, that is in the country of Moab, to the top of Pisgah, which looketh towards Jeshimon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%21%%And Israel sent messengers to Sihon king of the Amorites, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%22%%Let me pass through thy land: we will not turn into the fields, or into the vineyards; we will not drink of the waters of the well: but we will go along by the king's high-way, until we have past thy borders.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%23%%And Sihon would not suffer Israel to pass through his border: but Sihon collected all his people, and went out against Israel into the wilderness: and he came to Jahaz, and fought against Israel:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%24%%And Israel smote him with the edge of the sword, and possessed his land from Arnon to Jabbok, even to the children of Ammon: for the border of the children of Ammon was strong.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%25%%And Israel took all these cities: and Israel dwelt in all the cities of the Amorites, in Heshbon, and in all its villages.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%26%%For Heshbon was the city of Sihon the king of the Amorites, who had fought against the former king of Moab, and taken all his land out of his hand, even to Arnon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%27%%Wherefore they that speak in proverbs say, Come into Heshbon, let the city of Sihon be built and prepared.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%28%%For there has a fire gone out of Heshbon, a flame from the city of Sihon: it hath consumed Ar of Moab, and the lords of the high places of Arnon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%29%%Woe to thee, Moab! thou art undone, O people of Chemosh: he hath given his sons that escaped, and his daughters, into captivity to Sihon king of the Amorites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%30%%We have shot at them; Heshbon has perished even to Dibon, and we have laid them waste even to Nophah, which reacheth to Medeba.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%31%%Thus Israel dwelt in the land of the Amorites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%32%%And Moses sent to explore Jaazer, and they took its villages, and drove out the Amorites that were there.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%33%%And they turned and went up by the way of Bashan: and Og the king of Bashan went out against them, he, and all his people, to the battle at Edrei.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%34%%And the LORD said to Moses, Fear him not: for I have delivered him into thy hand, and all his people, and his land; and thou shalt do to him as thou didst to Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt at Heshbon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%21%%35%%So they smote him, and his sons, and all his people, until there was none left to him alive: and they possessed his land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%1%%And the children of Israel moved forward, and pitched in the plains of Moab on this side of Jordan by Jericho.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%2%%And Balak the son of Zippor saw all that Israel had done to the Amorites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%3%%And Moab was greatly afraid of the people, because they were many: and Moab was distressed because of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%4%%And Moab said to the elders of Midian, Now shall this company lick up all that are around us, as the ox licketh up the grass of the field. And Balak the son of Zippor was king of the Moabites at that time.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%5%%He sent messengers therefore to Balaam the son of Beor to Pethor, which is by the river of the land of the children of his people, to call him, saying, Behold, there has a people come out from Egypt: behold, they cover the face of the earth, and they abide over against me:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%6%%Come now therefore, I pray thee, Curse for me this people; for they are too mighty for me: it may be I shall prevail, that we may smite them, and that I may drive them out of the land: for I know that he whom thou blessest is blessed, and he whom thou cursest is cursed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%7%%And the elders of Moab and the elders of Midian departed with the rewards of divination in their hand; and they came to Balaam, and spoke to him the words of Balak.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%8%%And he said to them, Lodge here this night, and I will bring you word again, as the LORD shall speak to me: and the princes of Moab abode with Balaam.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%9%%And God came to Balaam, and said, What men are these with thee?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%10%%And Balaam said to God, Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, hath sent to me, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%11%%Behold, there has a people come out of Egypt, which covereth the face of the earth: come now, curse them for me: it may be I shall be able to overcome them, and drive them out.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%12%%And God said to Balaam, Thou shalt not go with them; thou shalt not curse the people: for they are blessed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%13%%And Balaam rose in the morning, and said to the princes of Balak, Depart into your land: for the LORD refuseth to give me leave to go with you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%14%%And the princes of Moab rose up, and they went to Balak, and said, Balaam refuseth to come with us.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%15%%And Balak sent yet again princes, more, and more honorable than they.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%16%%And they came to Balaam, and said to him, Thus saith Balak the son of Zippor, Let nothing, I pray thee, hinder thee from coming to me:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%17%%For I will promote thee to very great honor, and I will do whatever thou sayest to me: come therefore, I pray thee, curse this people for me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%18%%And Balaam answered and said to the servants of Balak, If Balak would give me his house full of silver and gold, I could not go beyond the word of the LORD my God, to do less or more.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%19%%Now therefore, I pray you, tarry ye also here this night, that I may know what the LORD will say to me more.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%20%%And God came to Balaam at night, and said to him, If the men come to call thee, rise and go with them; but yet the word which I shall say to thee, that shalt thou perform.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%21%%And Balaam rose in the morning, and saddled his ass, and went with the princes of Moab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%22%%And God's anger was kindled because he went: and the angel of the LORD stood in the way for an adversary against him. Now he was riding upon his ass, and his two servants were with him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%23%%And the ass saw the angel of the LORD standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and the ass turned aside out of the way, and went into the field: and Balaam smote the ass, to turn her into the way.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%24%%But the angel of the LORD stood in a path of the vineyards, a wall being on this side, and a wall on that side.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%25%%And when the ass saw the angel of the LORD, she thrust herself against the wall, and crushed Balaam's foot against the wall: and he smote her again.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%26%%And the angel of the LORD went further, and stood in a narrow place, where was no way to turn either to the right hand or to the left.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%27%%And when the ass saw the angel of the LORD, she fell down under Balaam: and Balaam's anger was kindled, and he smote the ass with a staff.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%28%%And the LORD opened the mouth of the ass, and she said to Balaam, What have I done to thee, that thou hast smitten me these three times?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%29%%And Balaam said to the ass, Because thou hast mocked me: I would there were a sword in my hand, for now would I kill thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%30%%And the ass said to Balaam, Am not I thy ass, upon which thou hast rid ever since I was thine to this day? was I ever wont to do so to thee? And he said, Nay.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%31%%Then the LORD opened the eyes of Balaam, and he saw the angel of the LORD standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and he bowed down his head, and fell flat on his face.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%32%%And the angel of the LORD said to him, Why hast thou smitten thy ass these three times? behold, I went out to withstand thee, because thy way is perverse before me:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%33%%And the ass saw me, and turned from me these three times: unless she had turned from me, surely now also I had slain thee, and saved her alive.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%34%%And Balaam said to the angel of the LORD, I have sinned; for I knew not that thou stoodest in the way against me: now therefore, if it displeaseth thee, I will return again.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%35%%And the angel of the LORD said to Balaam, Go with the men: but only the word that I shall speak to thee, that thou shalt speak: So Balaam went with the princes of Balak.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%36%%And when Balak heard that Balaam had come, he went out to meet him to a city of Moab, which is in the border of Arnon, which is in the utmost limit.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%37%%And Balak said to Balaam, Did I not earnestly send to thee to call thee? why camest thou not to me? am I not able indeed to promote thee to honor?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%38%%And Balaam said to Balak, Lo, I have come to thee: have I now any power at all to say any thing? the word that God putteth in my mouth, that shall I speak.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%39%%And Balaam went with Balak, and they came to Kirjath-huzoth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%40%%And Balak offered oxen and sheep, and sent to Balaam, and to the princes that were with him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%22%%41%%And it came to pass on the morrow, that Balak took Balaam, and conducted him to the high places of Baal, that thence he might see the utmost part of the people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%1%%And Balaam said to Balak, Build me here seven altars, and prepare me here seven oxen and seven rams.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%2%%And Balak did as Balaam had spoken; and Balak and Balaam offered on every altar a bullock and a ram.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%3%%And Balaam said to Balak, Stand by thy burnt-offering, and I will go: it may be the LORD will come to meet me: and whatever he showeth me I will tell thee. And he went to a high place.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%4%%And God met Balaam: and he said to him, I have prepared seven altars, and I have offered upon every altar a bullock and a ram.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%5%%And the LORD put a word in Balaam's mouth, and said, Return to Balak, and thus thou shalt speak.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%6%%And he returned to him and lo, he stood by his burnt-sacrifice, he, and all the princes of Moab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%7%%And he took up his parable, and said, Balak the king of Moab hath brought me from Aram, out of the mountains of the east, saying, Come, curse Jacob for me, and come, defy Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%8%%How shall I curse, whom God hath not cursed? or how shall I defy, whom the LORD hath not defied?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%9%%For from the top of the rocks I see him, and from the hills I behold him: lo, the people shall dwell alone, and shall not be reckoned among the nations.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%10%%Who can count the dust of Jacob, and the number of the fourth part of Israel? Let me die the death of the righteous, and let my last end be like his!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%11%%And Balak said to Balaam, What hast thou done to me? I took thee to curse my enemies, and behold, thou hast blessed them altogether.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%12%%And he answered and said, Must I not take heed to speak that which the LORD hath put in my mouth?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%13%%And Balak said to him, Come, I pray thee, with me to another place, from whence thou mayest see them: thou shalt see but the utmost part of them, and shalt not see them all: and from thence curse them for me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%14%%And he brought him into the field of Zophim, to the top of Pisgah, and built seven altars, and offered a bullock and a ram on every altar.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%15%%And he said to Balak, Stand here by thy burnt-offering, while I meet the LORD yonder.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%16%%And the LORD met Balaam, and put a word in his mouth, and said, Go again to Balak, and say thus.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%17%%And when he came to him, behold, he stood by his burnt-offering, and the princes of Moab with him. And Balak said to him, What hath the LORD spoken?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%18%%And he took up his parable, and said, Rise, Balak, and hear; hearken to me, thou son of Zippor:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%19%%God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoke, and shall he not make it good?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%20%%Behold, I have received commandment to bless: and he hath blessed, and I cannot reverse it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%21%%He hath not beheld iniquity in Jacob, neither hath he seen perverseness in Israel; the LORD his God is with him, and the shout of a king is among them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%22%%God brought them out of Egypt; he hath as it were the strength of a unicorn.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%23%%Surely there is no enchantment against Jacob, neither is there any divination against Israel: according to this time it shall be said of Jacob and of Israel, What hath God wrought!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%24%%Behold, the people shall rise up as a great lion, and lift up himself as a young lion: he shall not lie down until he shall eat of the prey, and drink the blood of the slain.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%25%%And Balak said to Balaam, Neither curse them at all, nor bless them at all.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%26%%But Balaam answered and said to Balak, Did I not tell thee, saying, All that the LORD speaketh, that I must do?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%27%%And Balak said to Balaam, Come, I pray thee, I will bring thee to another place; perhaps it will please God that thou mayest from thence curse them for me.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%28%%And Balak brought Balaam to the top of Peor, that looketh towards Jeshimon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%29%%And Balaam said to Balak, Build me here seven altars, and prepare me here seven bullocks and seven rams.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%23%%30%%And Balak did as Balaam had said, and offered a bullock and a ram on every altar.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%1%%And when Balaam saw that it pleased the LORD to bless Israel, he went not, as at other times, to seek for enchantments, but he set his face toward the wilderness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%2%%And Balaam lifted up his eyes, and he saw Israel abiding in his tents according to their tribes, and the spirit of God came upon him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%3%%And he took up his parable, and said, Balaam the son of Beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%4%%He hath said, who heard the words of God, who saw the vision of the Almighty, falling into a trance, but having his eyes open:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%5%%How goodly are thy tents, O Jacob, and thy tabernacles, O Israel!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%6%%As the valleys are they spread forth, as gardens by the river's side, as the trees of lign-aloes which the LORD hath planted, and as cedar-trees beside the waters.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%7%%He shall pour the water out of his buckets, and his seed shall be in many waters, and his king shall be higher than Agag, and his kingdom shall be exalted.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%8%%God brought him forth from Egypt; he hath as it were the strength of a unicorn: he shall eat up the nations his enemies, and shall break their bones, and pierce them through with his arrows.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%9%%He couched, he lay down as a lion, and as a great lion: who shall rouse him? Blessed is he that blesseth thee, and cursed is he that curseth thee.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%10%%And Balak's anger was kindled against Balaam, and he smote his hands together: and Balak said to Balaam, I called thee to curse my enemies, and behold, thou hast altogether blessed them these three times.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%11%%Therefore now flee thou to thy place: I thought to promote thee to great honor; but lo, the LORD hath kept thee back from honor.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%12%%And Balaam said to Balak, Did I not speak also to thy messengers whom thou sentest to me, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%13%%If Balak would give me his house full of silver and gold, I could not go beyond the commandment of the LORD, to do either good or bad of my own mind; but what the LORD saith, that will I speak?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%14%%And now, behold, I go to my people: come therefore, I will advertise thee what this people will do to thy people in the latter days.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%15%%And he took up his parable, and said, Balaam the son of Beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%16%%He hath said, who heard the words of God, and knew the knowledge of the Most High, who saw the vision of the Almighty, falling into a trance, but having his eyes open:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%17%%I shall see him, but not now: I shall behold him, but not nigh: there shall come a Star out of Jacob, and a Scepter shall rise out of Israel, and shall smite the corners of Moab, and destroy all the children of Sheth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%18%%And Edom shall be a possession, Seir also shall be a possession for his enemies; and Israel shall do valiantly.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%19%%Out of Jacob shall come he that shall have dominion, and shall destroy him that remaineth of the city.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%20%%And when he looked on Amalek, he took up his parable, and said, Amalek was the first of the nations, but his latter end shall be that he shall perish for ever.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%21%%And he looked on the Kenites, and took up his parable, and said, Strong is thy dwelling-place, and thou puttest thy nest in a rock.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%22%%Nevertheless, the Kenite shall be wasted, until Asher shall carry thee away captive.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%23%%And he took up his parable, and said, Alas, who shall live when God doeth this!
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%24%%And ships shall come from the coast of Chittim, and shall afflict Ashur, and shall afflict Eber, and he also shall perish for ever.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%24%%25%%And Balaam arose, and went and returned to his place: and Balak also went his way.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%1%%And Israel abode in Shittim, and the people began to commit lewdness with the daughters of Moab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%2%%And they called the people to the sacrifices of their gods: and the people ate, and bowed down to their gods.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%3%%And Israel joined himself to Baal-peor: and the anger of the LORD was kindled against Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%4%%And the LORD said to Moses, Take all the heads of the people, and hang them up before the LORD against the sun, that the fierce anger of the LORD may be turned away from Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%5%%And Moses said to the judges of Israel, Slay ye every one his men that were joined to Baal-peor.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%6%%And, behold, one of the children of Israel came and brought to his brethren a Midianitish woman in the sight of Moses, and in the sight of all the congregation of the children of Israel, who were weeping before the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%7%%And when Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron the priest, saw it, he rose from among the congregation, and took a javelin in his hand;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%8%%And he went after the man of Israel into the tent, and thrust both of them through, the man of Israel, and the woman through her belly: So the plague was stayed from the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%9%%And those that died in the plague were twenty and four thousand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%10%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%11%%Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron the priest, hath turned my wrath away from the children of Israel, (while he was zealous for my sake among them,) that I consumed not the children of Israel in my jealousy.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%12%%Wherefore say, Behold, I give to him my covenant of peace.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%13%%And he shall have it, and his seed after him, even the covenant of an everlasting priesthood; because he was zealous for his God, and made an atonement for the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%14%%Now the name of the Israelite that was slain, even that was slain with the Midianitish woman, was Zimri, the son of Salu, a prince of a chief house among the Simeonites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%15%%And the name of the Midianitish woman that was slain was Cozbi the daughter of Zur; he was head over a people, and of a chief house in Midian.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%16%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%17%%Distress the Midianites, and smite them:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%25%%18%%For they distress you with their wiles, with which they have beguiled you in the matter of Peor, and in the matter of Cozbi, the daughter of a prince of Midian their sister, who was slain in the day of the plague for Peor's sake.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%1%%And it came to pass after the plague, that the LORD spoke to Moses, and to Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%2%%Take the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers' house, all that are able to go to war in Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%3%%And Moses and Eleazar the priest spoke with them in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%4%%Take the sum of the people, from twenty years old and upward; as the LORD commanded Moses and the children of Israel, who went forth from the land of Egypt.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%5%%Reuben the eldest son of Israel: the children of Reuben; Hanoch, of whom cometh the family of the Hanochites: Of Phallu, the family of the Phalluites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%6%%Of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%7%%These are the families of the Reubenites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%8%%And the sons of Phallu; Eliab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%9%%And the sons of Eliab; Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. This is that Dathan and Abiram, who were famous in the congregation, who strove against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah, when they strove against the LORD:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%10%%And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died, when the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%11%%Notwithstanding the children of Korah died not.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%12%%The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites: of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites: of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%13%%Of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites: of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%14%%These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty and two thousand and two hundred.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%16%%Of Ozni, the family of the Oznites: of Eri, the family of the Erites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%17%%Of Arod, the family of the Arodites: of Areli, the family of the Arelites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%18%%These are the families of the children of Gad, according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%19%%The sons of Judah were Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%20%%And the sons of Judah after their families were; of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites: of Pharez, the family of the Pharezites: of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%24%%Of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites: of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%25%%These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, sixty four thousand and three hundred.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%31%%And of Asriel, the family of the Asrielites: and of Shechem, the family of the Shechemites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%32%%And of Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites: and of Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%38%%The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%39%%Of Shupham, the family of the Shuphamites: of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%42%%These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%43%%All the families of the Shuhamites according to those that were numbered of them were sixty and four thousand and four hundred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%44%%Of the children of Asher after their families: of Jimna, the family of the Jimnites: of Jesui, the family of the Jesuites: of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.

1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%46%%And the name of the daughter of Asher was Sarah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%47%%These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them; who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%48%%Of the sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites: of Guni, the family of the Gunites:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%49%%Of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites: of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%50%%These are the families of Naphtali according to their families: and they that were numbered of them, were forty and five thousand and four hundred.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%51%%These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%52%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%53%%To these the land shall be divided for an inheritance, according to the number of names.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%54%%To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given, according to those that were numbered of him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%55%%Notwithstanding, the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%56%%According to the lot shall the possession of it be divided between many and few.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%57%%And these are they that were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites: of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites: of Merari, the family of the Merarites.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%58%%These are the families of the Levites: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korathites. And Kohath begat Amram.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%59%%And the name of Amram's wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bore to Levi in Egypt: and she bore to Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%60%%And to Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%61%%And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%62%%And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%63%%These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%64%%But among these there was not a man of them whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered, when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%26%%65%%For the LORD had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. And there was not left a man of them, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%1%%Then came the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph: and these are the names of his daughters; Mahlah, Noah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Tirzah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%2%%And they stood before Moses, and before Eleazar the priest, and before the princes, and all the congregation, by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%3%%Our father died in the wilderness, and he was not in the company of them that assembled themselves against the LORD in the company of Korah; but died in his own sin, and had no sons.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%4%%Why should the name of our father be done away from among his family, because he hath no son? Give to us therefore a possession among the brethren of our father.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%5%%And Moses brought their cause before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%6%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%7%%The daughters of Zelophehad speak what is right: thou shalt surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father's brethren; and thou shalt cause the inheritance of their father to pass to them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%8%%And thou shalt speak to the children of Israel, saying, If a man shall die, and have no son, then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass to his daughter.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%9%%And if he shall have no daughter, then ye shall give his inheritance to his brethren.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%10%%And if he shall have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance to his father's brethren.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%11%%And if his father shall have no brethren, then ye shall give inheritance to his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it: and it shall be to the children of Israel a statute of judgment, as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%12%%And the LORD said to Moses, Ascend this mount Abarim, and see the land which I have given to the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%13%%And when thou hast seen it, thou also shalt be gathered to thy people, as Aaron thy brother was gathered.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%14%%For ye rebelled against my commandment in the desert of Zin, in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify me at the water before their eyes: that is the water of Meribah in Kadesh in the wilderness of Zin.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%15%%And Moses spoke to the LORD, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%16%%Let the LORD, the God of the spirits of all flesh, set a man over the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%17%%Who may go out before them, and who may go in before them, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in; that the congregation of the LORD be not as sheep which have no shepherd.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%18%%And the LORD said to Moses, Take to thee Joshua the son of Nun, a man in whom is the spirit, and lay thy hand upon him;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%19%%And set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation: and give him a charge in their sight.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%20%%And thou shalt put some of thy honor upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%21%%And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall ask counsel for him after the judgment of Urim before the LORD: at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%22%%And Moses did as the LORD commanded him: and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%27%%23%%And he laid his hands upon him, and gave him a charge, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%2%%Command the children of Israel, and say to them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savor to me, shall ye observe to offer to me in their due season.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%3%%And thou shalt say to them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer to the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%4%%The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at evening.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%5%%And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat-offering, mingled with a fourth part of a hin of beaten oil.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%6%%It is a continual burnt-offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%7%%And the drink-offering of it shall be the fourth part of a hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured to the LORD for a drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%8%%And the other lamb shalt thou offer at evening; as the meat-offering of the morning, and as the drink-offering of it, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%9%%And on the sabbath-day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth-parts of flour for a meat-offering, mingled with oil, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%10%%This is the burnt-offering of every sabbath, besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%11%%And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt-offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%12%%And three tenth-parts of flour for a meat-offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth-parts of flour for a meat-offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%13%%And a several tenth-part of flour mingled with oil for a meat-offering to one lamb, for a burnt-offering of a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%14%%And their drink-offering shall be half a hin of wine to a bullock, and the third part of a hin to a ram, and a fourth part of a hin to a lamb: this is the burnt-offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%15%%And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering to the LORD shall be offered, besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%16%%And on the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%17%%And on the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%18%%On the first day shall be a holy convocation; in it ye shall do no manner of servile work.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%19%%But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt-offering to the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be to you without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%20%%And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth-parts shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth-parts for a ram;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%21%%A several tenth-part shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%22%%And one goat for a sin-offering, to make an atonement for you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%23%%Ye shall offer these besides the burnt-offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%24%%After this manner ye shall offer daily throughout the seven days, the food of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD: it shall be offered besides the continual burnt-offering, and his drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%25%%And on the seventh day ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%26%%Also in the day of the first-fruits, when ye bring a new meat-offering to the LORD, after your weeks are ended, ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%27%%But ye shall offer the burnt-offering for a sweet savor to the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%28%%And their meat-offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to one bullock, two tenth-parts to one ram,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%29%%A several tenth part to one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%30%%And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%28%%31%%Ye shall offer them besides the continual burnt-offering and his meat-offering (they shall be to you without blemish) and their drink-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%1%%And in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the trumpets to you.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%2%%And ye shall offer a burnt-offering for a sweet savor to the LORD; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%3%%And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts for a bullock, and two tenth-parts for a ram,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%4%%And one tenth-part for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%5%%And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering, to make an atonement for you:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%6%%Besides the burnt-offering of the month, and his meat-offering, and the daily burnt-offering, and his meat-offering, and their drink-offerings, according to their manner, for a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%7%%And ye shall have on the tenth day of this seventh month a holy convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls: in it ye shall not do any work.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%8%%But ye shall offer a burnt-offering to the LORD for a sweet savor; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year; they shall be to you without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%9%%And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to a bullock, and two tenth-parts to one ram,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%10%%A several tenth-part for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%11%%One kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the sin-offering of atonement, and the continual burnt-offering, and the meat-offering of it, and their drink-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%12%%And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work, and ye shall keep a feast to the LORD seven days:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%13%%And ye shall offer a burnt-offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD; thirteen young bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%14%%And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth-parts to each ram of the two rams,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%15%%And a several tenth-part to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%16%%And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, his meat-offering, and his drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%17%%And on the second day ye shall offer twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%18%%And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%19%%And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and their drink-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%20%%And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%21%%And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%22%%And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%23%%And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%24%%Their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%25%%And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%26%%And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%27%%And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%28%%And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%29%%And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%30%%And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%31%%And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%32%%And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%33%%And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%34%%And one goat for a sin-offering: besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%35%%On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: in it ye shall do no servile work.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%36%%But ye shall offer a burnt-offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%37%%Their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%38%%And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%29%%39%%These things ye shall do to the LORD in your set feasts, besides your vows, and your free-will-offerings, for your burnt-offerings, and for your meat-offerings, and for your drink-offerings, and for your peace-offerings.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%1%%And Moses told the children of Israel according to all that the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%2%%And Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes concerning the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the LORD hath commanded.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%3%%If a man shall vow a vow to the LORD, or swear an oath to bind his soul with a bond; he shall not break his word; he shall do according to all that proceedeth out of his mouth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%4%%If a woman also shall vow a vow to the LORD, and bind herself by a bond, being in her father's house in her youth;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%5%%And her father shall hear her vow, and her bond with which she hath bound her soul, and her father shall hold his peace at her: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond with which she hath bound her soul shall stand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%6%%But if her father shall disallow her in the day that he heareth; not any of her vows or of her bonds with which she hath bound her soul shall stand: and the LORD shall forgive her, because her father disallowed her.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%7%%And if she had a husband when she vowed, or uttered aught from her lips, with which she bound her soul;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%8%%And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her in the day that he heard it: then her vows shall stand, and her bonds with which she bound her soul shall stand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%9%%But if her husband disallowed her on the day that he heard it; then he shall make of no effect her vow which she vowed, and that which she uttered with her lips, with which she bound her soul: and the LORD shall forgive her.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%10%%But every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, with which they have bound their souls, shall stand against her.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%11%%And if she vowed in her husband's house, or bound her soul by a bond with an oath;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%12%%And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her, and disallowed her not: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond with which she bound her soul shall stand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%13%%But if her husband hath utterly made them void on the day he heard them; then whatever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her soul, shall not stand: her husband hath made them void; and the LORD shall forgive her.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%14%%Every vow, and every binding oath to afflict the soul, her husband may establish it, or her husband may make it void.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%15%%But if her husband altogether holds his peace at her from day to day; then he establisheth all her vows, or all her bonds, which are upon her: he confirmeth them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%16%%But if he shall any way make them void after that he hath heard them; then he shall bear her iniquity.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%30%%17%%These are the statutes which the LORD commanded Moses, between a man and his wife, between the father and his daughter, being yet in her youth in her father's house.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%1%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%2%%Avenge the children of Israel of the Midianites: afterward shalt thou be gathered to thy people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%3%%And Moses spoke to the people, saying, Arm some of yourselves for the war, and let them go against the Midianites, and avenge the LORD on Midian.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%4%%Of every tribe a thousand, throughout all the tribes of Israel, shall ye send to the war.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%5%%So there were delivered out of the thousands of Israel, a thousand of every tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%6%%And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand of every tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%7%%And they warred against the Midianites, as the LORD commanded Moses; and they slew all the males.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%8%%And they slew the kings of Midian, besides the rest of them that were slain; namely, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, five kings of Midian: Balaam also the son of Beor they slew with the sword.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%9%%And the children of Israel took all the women of Midian captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil of all their cattle, and all their flocks, and all their goods.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%10%%And they burnt all their cities in which they dwelt, and all their goodly castles, with fire.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%11%%And they took all the spoil, and all the prey, both of men and of beasts.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%12%%And they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil to Moses and Eleazar the priest, and to the congregation of the children of Israel, to the camp at the plains of Moab, which are by Jordan near Jericho.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%13%%And Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and all the princes of the congregation, went forth to meet them without the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%14%%And Moses was wroth with the officers of the host, with the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, who came from the battle.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%15%%And Moses said to them, Have ye saved all the women alive?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%16%%Behold, these caused the children of Israel, through the counsel of Balaam, to commit trespass against the LORD, in the matter of Peor, and there was a plague among the congregation of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%17%%Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath known man by lying with him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%18%%But all the female children, that have not known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%19%%And do ye abide without the camp seven days: whoever hath killed any person, and whoever hath touched any slain, purify both yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%20%%And purify all your raiment, and all that is made of skins, and all work of goats' hair, and all things made of wood.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%21%%And Eleazar the priest said to the men of war who went to the battle, This is the ordinance of the law which the LORD commanded Moses;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%22%%Only the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%23%%Every thing that may abide the fire, ye shall make it go through the fire, and it shall be clean: nevertheless it shall be purified with the water of separation: and all that abideth not the fire ye shall make go through the water.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%24%%And ye shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and ye shall be clean, and afterward ye shall come into the camp.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%25%%And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%26%%Take the sum of the prey that was taken, both of man and of beast, thou, and Eleazar the priest, and the chief fathers of the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%27%%And divide the prey into two parts; between them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle, and between all the congregation:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%28%%And levy a tribute to the LORD of the men of war who went out to battle: one soul of five hundred, both of the persons, and of the beeves, and of the asses, and of the sheep:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%29%%Take it of their half, and give it to Eleazar the priest, for a heave-offering of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%30%%And of the children of Israel's half, thou shalt take one portion of fifty, of the persons, of the beeves, of the asses, and of the flocks, of all manner of beasts, and give them to the Levites, who keep the charge of the tabernacle of the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%31%%And Moses and Eleazar the priest did as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%32%%And the booty, being the rest of the prey which the men of war had taken, was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%33%%And seventy two thousand beeves,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%34%%And sixty one thousand asses,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%35%%And thirty and two thousand persons in all, of women that had not known man by lying with him.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%36%%And the half which was the portion of them that went out to war, was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%37%%And the LORD'S tribute of the sheep was six hundred and seventy five.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%38%%And the beeves were thirty and six thousand; of which the LORD'S tribute was seventy two.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%39%%And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the LORD'S tribute was sixty one.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%40%%And the persons were sixteen thousand, of which the LORD'S tribute was thirty and two persons.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%41%%And Moses gave the tribute, which was the LORD'S heave-offering, to Eleazar the priest, as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%42%%And of the children of Israel's half, which Moses divided from the men that warred,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%43%%(Now the half that pertained to the congregation was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand and seven thousand and five hundred sheep,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%44%%And thirty and six thousand beeves,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%45%%And thirty thousand asses and five hundred,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%46%%And sixteen thousand persons;)
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%47%%Even of the children of Israel's half, Moses took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them to the Levites, who kept the charge of the tabernacle of the LORD; as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%48%%And the officers who were over thousands of the hosts, the captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds, came near to Moses:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%49%%And they said to Moses, Thy servants have taken the sum of the men of war who are under our charge, and there lacketh not one man of us.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%50%%We have therefore brought an oblation for the LORD, what every man hath obtained of jewels of gold, chains, and bracelets, rings, ear-rings, and tablets, to make an atonement for our souls before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%51%%And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of them, even all wrought jewels.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%52%%And all the gold of the offering that they offered to the LORD, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%53%%(For the men of war had taken spoil, every man for himself.)
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%31%%54%%And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands, and of hundreds, and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation, for a memorial for the children of Israel before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%1%%Now the children of Reuben and the children of Gad had a very great multitude of cattle: and when they saw the land of Jazer, and the land of Gilead, that behold, the place was a place for cattle;
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%2%%The children of Gad and the children of Reuben came and spoke to Moses, and to Eleazar the priest, and to the princes of the congregation, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%3%%Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Shebam, and Nebo, and Beon,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%4%%Even the country which the LORD smote before the congregation of Israel, is a land for cattle, and thy servants have cattle:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%5%%Wherefore, said they, if we have found grace in thy sight, let this land be given to thy servants for a possession, and bring us not over Jordan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%6%%And Moses said to the children of Gad and to the children of Reuben, Shall your brethren go to war, and shall ye sit here?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%7%%And why discourage ye the heart of the children of Israel from going over into the land which the LORD hath given them?
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%8%%Thus did your fathers, when I sent them from Kadesh-barnea to see the land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%9%%For when they went up to the valley of Eshcol, and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of the children of Israel, that they should not go into the land which the LORD had given them.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%10%%And the LORD'S anger was kindled the same time, and he swore, saying,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%11%%Surely none of the men that came up from Egypt, from twenty years old and upward, shall see the land which I swore to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; because they have not wholly followed me:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%12%%Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite, and Joshua the son of Nun: for they have wholly followed the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%13%%And the LORD'S anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation that had done evil in the sight of the LORD was consumed.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%14%%And behold, ye have risen up in your fathers' stead, an increase of sinful men, to augment yet the fierce anger of the LORD towards Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%15%%For if ye turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the wilderness; and he will destroy all this people.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%16%%And they came near to him, and said, We will build sheep-folds here for our cattle, and cities for our little ones:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%17%%But we ourselves will go ready armed before the children of Israel, until we have brought them to their place: and our little ones shall dwell in the fortified cities, because of the inhabitants of the land.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%18%%We will not return to our houses, until the children of Israel have inherited every man his inheritance.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%19%%For we will not inherit with them on the other side of Jordan, or forward; because our inheritance hath fallen to us on this side of Jordan eastward.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%20%%And Moses said to them, If ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before the LORD to war,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%21%%And will go all of you armed over Jordan before the LORD, until he hath driven out his enemies from before him,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%22%%And the land shall be subdued before the LORD: then afterward ye shall return, and be guiltless before the LORD, and before Israel; and this land shall be your possession before the LORD.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%23%%But if ye will not do so, behold, ye have sinned against the LORD: and be sure your sin will find you out.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%24%%Build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which hath proceeded out of your mouth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%25%%And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben spoke to Moses, saying, Thy servants will do as my lord commandeth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%26%%Our little ones, our wives, our flocks, and all our cattle, shall be there in the cities of Gilead:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%27%%But thy servants will pass over, every man armed for war, before the LORD to battle, as my lord saith.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%28%%So concerning them Moses commanded Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the chief fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%29%%And Moses said to them, If the children of Gad and the children of Reuben will pass with you over Jordan, every man armed for battle, before the LORD, and the land shall be subdued before you; then ye shall give them the land of Gilead for a possession:
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%30%%But if they will not pass over with you armed, they shall have possessions among you in the land of Canaan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%31%%And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben answered, saying, As the LORD hath said to thy servants, so will we do.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%32%%We will pass over armed before the LORD into the land of Canaan, that the possession of our inheritance on this side Jordan may be ours.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%33%%And Moses gave to them, even to the children of Gad, and to the children of Reuben, and to half the tribe of Manasseh the son of Joseph, the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, and the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, the land, with its cities in the borders, even the cities of the country around.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%34%%And the children of Gad built Dibon, and Ataroth, and Aroer,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%35%%And Atroth, Shophan, and Jaazer, and Jogbehah,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%36%%And Beth-nimrah, and Beth-haran, fortified cities: and folds for sheep.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%37%%And the children of Reuben built Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Kirjathaim,
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%38%%And Nebo, and Baal-meon, (their names being changed,) and Shibmah: and gave other names to the cities which they built.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%39%%And the children of Machir the son of Manasseh went to Gilead, and took it, and dispossessed the Amorite who was in it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%40%%And Moses gave Gilead to Machir the son of Manasseh; and he dwelt in it.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%41%%And Jair the son of Manasseh went and took its small towns, and called them Havoth-jair.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%32%%42%%And Nobah went and took Kenath, and its villages, and called it Nobah, after his own name.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%1%%These are the journeys of the children of Israel, who went forth from the land of Egypt with their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%2%%And Moses wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the commandment of the LORD: and these are their journeys according to their goings out.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%3%%And they departed from Rameses in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the passover the children of Israel went out with a high hand in the sight of all the Egyptians.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%4%%For the Egyptians buried all their first-born, whom the LORD had smitten among them: upon their gods also the LORD executed judgments.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%5%%And the children of Israel removed from Rameses, and encamped in Succoth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%6%%And they departed from Succoth, and encamped in Etham, which is in the edge of the wilderness.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%7%%And they removed from Etham, and turned again to Pi-hahiroth, which is before Baal-zephon: and they encamped before Migdol.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%8%%And they departed from before Pi-hahiroth, and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness, and went three days' journey in the wilderness of Etham, and encamped in Marah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%9%%And they removed from Marah, and came to Elim: and in Elim were twelve fountains of water, and seventy palm-trees; and they encamped there.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%10%%And they removed from Elim, and encamped by the Red sea.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%11%%And they removed from the Red sea, and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%12%%And they took their journey out of the wilderness of Sin, and encamped in Dophkah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%13%%And they departed from Dophkah, and encamped in Alush.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%14%%And they removed from Alush, and encamped at Rephidim, where was no water for the people to drink.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%15%%And they departed from Rephidim, and encamped in the wilderness of Sinai.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%16%%And they removed from the desert of Sinai, and encamped at Kibroth-hattaavah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%17%%And they departed from Kibroth-hattaavah, and encamped at Hazeroth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%18%%And they departed from Hazeroth, and encamped in Rithmah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%19%%And they departed from Rithmah, and encamped at Rimmon-parez.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%20%%And they departed from Rimmon-parez, and encamped in Libnah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%21%%And they removed from Libnah, and encamped at Rissah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%22%%And they journeyed from Rissah, and encamped in Kehelathah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%23%%And they went from Kehelathah, and encamped in mount Shapher.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%24%%And they removed from mount Shapher, and encamped in Haradah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%25%%And they removed from Haradah, and encamped in Makheloth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%26%%And they removed from Makheloth, and encamped at Tahath.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%27%%And they departed from Tahath, and encamped at Tarah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%28%%And they removed from Tarah, and encamped in Mithcah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%29%%And they went from Mithcah, and encamped in Hashmonah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%30%%And they departed from Hashmonah, and encamped at Moseroth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%31%%And they departed from Moseroth, and encamped in Bene-jaakan.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%32%%And they removed from Bene-jaakan, and encamped at Hor-hagidgad.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%33%%And they went from Hor-hagidgad, and encamped in Jotbathah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%34%%And they removed from Jotbathah, and encamped at Ebronah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%35%%And they departed from Ebronah, and encamped at Ezion-gaber.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%36%%And they removed from Ezion-gaber, and encamped in the wilderness of Zin, which is Kadesh.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%37%%And they removed from Kadesh, and encamped in mount Hor, in the edge of the land of Edom.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%38%%And Aaron the priest ascended mount Hor at the commandment of the LORD, and died there, in the fortieth year after the children of Israel departed from the land of Egypt, in the first day of the fifth month.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%39%%And Aaron was a hundred and twenty and three years old when he died in mount Hor.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%40%%And king Arad the Canaanite who dwelt in the south in the land of Canaan, heard of the coming of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%41%%And they departed from mount Hor, and encamped in Zalmonah.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%42%%And they departed from Zalmonah, and encamped in Punon.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%43%%And they departed from Punon, and encamped in Oboth.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%44%%And they departed from Oboth, and encamped in Ije-abarim, in the border of Moab.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%45%%And they departed from Iim, and encamped in Dibon-gad.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%46%%And they removed from Dibon-gad, and encamped in Almon-diblathaim.
1000005%%Numbers%%OT%%33%%47%%And they removed from Almon-diblathaim, and encamped on the mountains of Abarim, before Nebo.
