1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%30%%And the LORD delivered it also, and its king, into the hand of Israel; and he smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were in it; he let none remain in it; but did to the king of it as he did to the king of Jericho.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%31%%And Joshua passed from Libnah, and all Israel with him, to Lachish, and encamped against it, and fought against it:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%32%%And the LORD delivered Lachish into the hand of Israel, who took it on the second day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were in it, according to all that he had done to Libnah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%33%%Then Horam king of Gezer came up to help Lachish; and Joshua smote him and his people, until he had left him none remaining.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%34%%And from Lachish Joshua passed to Eglon, and all Israel with him; and they encamped against it, and fought against it:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%35%%And they took it on that day, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls that were in it he utterly destroyed that day, according to all that he had done to Lachish.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%36%%And Joshua went up from Eglon, and all Israel with him, to Hebron; and they fought against it:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%37%%And they took it, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and its king, and all its cities, and all the souls that were in them; he left none remaining (according to all that he had done to Eglon) but destroyed it utterly, and all the souls that were in it.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%38%%And Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to Debir; and fought against it:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%39%%And he took it, and its king, and all its cities, and they smote them with the edge of the sword, and utterly destroyed all the souls that were in them; he left none remaining: as he had done to Hebron, so he did to Debir, and to its king; as he had done also to Libnah, and to its king.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%40%%So Joshua smote all the country of the hills, and of the south, and of the vale, and of the springs, and all their kings: he left none remaining, but utterly destroyed all that breathed, as the LORD God of Israel commanded.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%41%%And Joshua smote them from Kadesh-barnea even to Gaza, and all the country of Goshen, even to Gibeon.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%42%%And all these kings and their land did Joshua take at one time; because the LORD God of Israel fought for Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%10%%43%%And Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to the camp in Gilgal.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%1%%And it came to pass, when Jabin king of Hazor had heard those things, that he sent to Jobab king of Madon, and to the king of Shimron, and to the king Achshaph,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%2%%And to the kings that were on the north of the mountains, and of the plains south of Cinneroth, and in the valley, and in the borders of Dor on the west,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%3%%And to the Canaanite on the east and on the west, and to the Amorite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, and the Jebusite in the mountains, and to the Hivite under Hermon in the land of Mizpeh.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%4%%And they went out, they and all their hosts with them, many people, even as the sand that is upon the sea-shore in multitude, with horses and chariots very numerous.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%5%%And when all these kings were met together, they came and encamped together at the waters of Merom, to fight against Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%6%%And the LORD said to Joshua, Be not afraid because of them: for to-morrow about this time will I deliver them up all slain before Israel: thou shalt hough their horses, and burn their chariots with fire.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%7%%So Joshua came, and all the people of war with him, against them by the waters of Merom suddenly, and they fell upon them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%8%%And the LORD delivered them into the hand of Israel, who smote them, and chased them to great Zidon, and to Misrephoth-maim, and to the valley of Mizpeh eastward; and they smote them, until they left to them none remaining.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%9%%And Joshua did to them as the LORD bade him: he houghed their horses, and burnt their chariots with fire.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%10%%And Joshua at that time turned back, and took Hazor, and smote its king with the sword: for Hazor before-time was the head of all those kingdoms.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%11%%And they smote all the souls that were in it with the edge of the sword, utterly destroying them: there was not any left to breathe: and he burnt Hazor with fire.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%12%%And all the cities of those kings, and all the kings of them, Joshua took, and smote them with the edge of the sword, and he utterly destroyed them, as Moses the servant of the LORD commanded.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%13%%But as for the cities that stood still in their strength, Israel burned none of them, save Hazor only; that did Joshua burn.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%14%%And all the spoil of these cities, and the cattle, the children of Israel took for a prey to themselves: but every man they smote with the edge of the sword, until they had destroyed them, neither left they any to breathe.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%15%%As the LORD commanded Moses his servant, so did Moses command Joshua, and so did Joshua: he left nothing undone of all that the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%16%%So Joshua took all that land, the hills, and all the south country, and all the land of Goshen, and the valley, and the plain, and the mountain of Israel, and the valley of the same;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%17%%Even from the mount Halak, that goeth up to Seir, even to Baal-gad, in the valley of Lebanon under mount Hermon: and all their kings he took, and smote them, and slew them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%18%%Joshua made war a long time with all those kings.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%19%%There was not a city that made peace with the children of Israel, save the Hivites the inhabitants of Gibeon: all other they took in battle.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%20%%For it was of the LORD to harden their hearts, that they should come against Israel in battle, that he might destroy them utterly, and that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy them, as the LORD commanded Moses.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%21%%And at that time came Joshua and cut off the Anakims from the mountains, from Hebron, from Debir, from Anab, and from all the mountains of Judah, and from all the mountains of Israel: Joshua destroyed them utterly with their cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%22%%There was none of the Anakims left in the land of the children of Israel: only in Gaza, in Gath, and in Ashdod, there remained.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%11%%23%%So Joshua took the whole land, according to all that the LORD said to Moses, and Joshua gave it for an inheritance to Israel according to their divisions by their tribes. And the land rested from war.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%1%%Now these are the kings of the land, whom the children of Israel smote, and possessed their land on the other side of Jordan towards the rising of the sun, from the river Arnon, to mount Hermon, and all the plain on the east:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%2%%Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon, and ruled from Aroer, which is upon the bank of the river Arnon, and from the middle of the river, and from half Gilead, even to the river Jabbok, which is the border of the children of Ammon;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%3%%And from the plain to the sea of Cinneroth on the east, and to the sea of the plain, even the salt sea on the east, the way to Beth-jeshimoth; and from the south, under Ashdoth-pisgah:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%4%%And the coast of Og king of Bashan, who was of the remnant of the giants, that dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%5%%And reigned in mount Hermon, and in Salcah, and in all Bashan, to the border of the Geshurites, and the Maachathites, and half Gilead, the border of Sihon king of Heshbon.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%6%%Them did Moses the servant of the LORD, and the children of Israel smite: and Moses the servant of the LORD gave it for a possession to the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%7%%And these are the kings of the country whom Joshua and the children of Israel smote on this side of Jordan on the west, from Baal-gad in the valley of Lebanon, even to the mount Halak that goeth up to Seir; which Joshua gave to the tribes of Israel for a possession according to their divisions;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%8%%In the mountains, and in the valleys, and in the plains, and in the springs, and in the wilderness, and in the south country; the Hittites, the Amorites, and the Canaanites, the Perizzites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites:

1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%12%%24%%The king of Tirzah, one: all the kings thirty and one.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%1%%Now Joshua was old and advanced in years; and the LORD said to him Thou art old and advanced in years, and there remaineth yet very much land to be possessed.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%2%%This is the land that yet remaineth: all the borders of the Philistines, and all Geshuri,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%3%%From Sihor, which is before Egypt, even to the borders of Ekron northward, which is counted to the Canaanite: five lords of the Philistines; the Gazathites, and the Ashdothites, the Eshkalonites, the Gittites, and the Ekronites; also the Avites:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%4%%From the south all the land of the Canaanites, and Mearah that is beside the Sidonians, to Aphek to the borders of the Amorites:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%5%%And the land of the Giblites, and all Lebanon towards the sun-rising, from Baal-gad under mount Hermon to the entering into Hamath.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%6%%And the inhabitants of the hill-country from Lebanon to Misrephoth-maim, and all the Sidonians, them will I drive out from before the children of Israel: only divide thou it by lot to the Israelites for an inheritance, as I have commanded thee.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%7%%Now therefore divide this land for an inheritance to the nine tribes, and the half tribe of Manasseh,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%8%%With whom the Reubenites and the Gadites have received their inheritance, which Moses gave them, beyond Jordan eastward, even as Moses the servant of the LORD gave them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%9%%From Aroer that is upon the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain of Medeba to Dibon;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%10%%And all the cities of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, to the border of the children of Ammon;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%11%%And Gilead, and the border of the Geshurites and Maachathites, and all mount Hermon, and all Bashan to Salcah;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%12%%All the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei, who remained of the remnant of the giants. For these did Moses smite, and cast them out.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%13%%Nevertheless, the children of Israel expelled not the Geshurites, nor the Maachathites: but the Geshurites and the Maachathites dwell among the Israelites until this day.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%14%%Only to the tribe of Levi he gave no inheritance; the sacrifices of the LORD God of Israel made by fire are their inheritance, as he said to them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%15%%And Moses gave to the tribe of the children of Reuben inheritance according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%16%%And their border was from Aroer that is on the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain by Medeba;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%17%%Heshbon, and all her cities that are in the plain; Dibon, and Bamoth-baal, and Beth-baal-meon,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%18%%And Jahaza, and Kedemoth, and Mephaath,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%19%%And Kirjathaim, and Sibmah, and Zareth-shahar in the mount of the valley,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%20%%And Beth-peor, and Ashdoth-pisgah, and Beth-jeshimoth,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%21%%And all the cities of the plain, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, whom Moses smote with the princes of Midian, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, dukes of Sihon, dwelling in the country.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%22%%Balaam also the son of Beor, the sooth-sayer, did the children of Israel slay with the sword, among them that were slain by them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%23%%And the border of the children of Reuben was Jordan, and its border. This was the inheritance of the children of Reuben after their families, the cities and their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%24%%And Moses gave inheritance to the tribe of Gad, even to the children of Gad according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%25%%And their border was Jazer, and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the children of Ammon, to Aroer that is before Rabbah;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%26%%And from Heshbon to Ramath-mizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim to the border of Debir;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%27%%And in the valley, Beth-aram, and Beth-nimrah, and Succoth, and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, Jordan and its border, even to the edge of the sea of Cinneroth, on the other side of Jordan eastward.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%28%%This is the inheritance of the children of Gad after their families, the cities, and their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%29%%And Moses gave inheritance to the half-tribe of Manasseh: and this was the possession of the half-tribe of the children of Manasseh by their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%30%%And their border was from Mahanaim, all Bashan, all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, and all the towns of Jair, which are in Bashan, sixty cities:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%31%%And half Gilead, and Ashtaroth, and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were pertaining to the children of Machir the son of Manasseh, even to the one half of the children of Machir by their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%32%%These are the countries which Moses distributed for inheritance in the plains of Moab, on the other side of Jordan by Jericho eastward.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%13%%33%%But to the tribe of Levi Moses gave not any inheritance: the LORD God of Israel was their inheritance, as he said to them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%1%%And these are the countries which the children of Israel inherited in the land of Canaan, which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel distributed for inheritance to them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%2%%By lot was their inheritance, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses, for the nine tribes, and for the half-tribe.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%3%%For Moses had given the inheritance of two tribes and a half-tribe on the other side of Jordan: but to the Levites he gave no inheritance among them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%4%%For the children of Joseph were two tribes, Manasseh and Ephraim: therefore they gave no part to the Levites in the land, save cities to dwell in, with their suburbs for their cattle, and for their substance.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%5%%As the LORD commanded Moses, so the children of Israel did, and they divided the land.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%6%%Then the children of Judah came to Joshua in Gilgal: and Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite said to him, Thou knowest the thing that the LORD said to Moses the man of God concerning me and thee in Kadesh-barnea.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%7%%Forty years old was I when Moses the servant of the LORD sent me from Kadesh-barnea to explore the land; and I brought him word again as it was in my heart.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%8%%Nevertheless, my brethren that went up with me made the heart of the people melt: but I wholly followed the LORD my God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%9%%And Moses swore on that day, saying, Surely the land on which thy feet have trodden shall be thy inheritance, and thy children's for ever; because thou hast wholly followed the LORD my God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%10%%And now, behold, the LORD hath kept me alive, as he said, these forty and five years, even since the LORD spoke this word to Moses, while the children of Israel wandered in the wilderness: and now, lo, I am this day eighty five years old.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%11%%As yet I am as strong this day, as I was in the day that Moses sent me: as my strength was then, even so is my strength now, for war, both to go out, and to come in.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%12%%Now therefore give me this mountain, of which the LORD spoke in that day; for thou heardest in that day how the Anakims were there, and that the cities were great and fortified: if the LORD will be with me, then I shall be able to drive them out, as the LORD said.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%13%%And Joshua blessed him, and gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh Hebron for an inheritance.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%14%%Hebron therefore became the inheritance of Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenezite to this day; because that he wholly followed the LORD God of Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%14%%15%%And the name of Hebron before was Kirjath-arba; which Arba was a great man among the Anakims. And the land had rest from war.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%1%%This then was the lot of the tribe of the children of Judah by their families; even to the border of Edom, the wilderness of Zin southward was the uttermost part of the south border.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%2%%And their south border was from the shore of the salt-sea, from the bay that looketh southward:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%3%%And it went out to the south side to Maaleh-acrabbim, and passed along to Zin, and ascended on the south side to Kadesh-barnea, and passed along to Hezron, and went up to Adar, and fetched a compass to Karkaa:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%4%%From thence it passed towards Azmon, and went out to the river of Egypt; and the limits of that border were at the sea: this shall be your south limit.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%5%%And the east border was the salt-sea, even to the end of Jordan: and their border in the north quarter was from the bay of the sea, at the uttermost part of Jordan:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%6%%And the border went up to Beth-hogla, and passed along by the north of Beth-arabah; and the border went up to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%7%%And the border went up towards Debir from the valley of Achor, and so northward looking towards Gilgal, that is before the going up to Adummim, which is on the south side of the river: and the border passed towards the waters of En-shemesh, and the borders of it were at En-rogel:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%8%%And the border went up by the valley of the son of Hinnom, to the south side of the Jebusite; the same is Jerusalem: and the border went up to the top of the mountain that lieth before the valley of Hinnom westward, which is at the end of the valley of the giants northward:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%9%%And the border was drawn from the top of the hill to the fountain of the water of Nephtoah, and went out to the cities of mount Ephron; and the border was drawn to Baalah, which is Kirjath-jearim:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%10%%And the border compassed from Baalah westward to mount Seir, and passed along to the side of mount Jearim (which is Chesalon) on the north side, and went down to Beth-shemesh, and passed on to Timnah:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%11%%And the border went out to the side of Ekron northward: and the border was drawn to Shicron, and passed along to mount Baalah, and went out to Jabneel; and the terminations of the border were at the sea.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%12%%And the west border was to the great sea, and its coast: this is the border of the children of Judah round about, according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%13%%And to Caleb the son of Jephunneh he gave a part among the children of Judah, according to the commandment of the LORD to Joshua, even the city of Arba the father of Anak, which city is Hebron.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%14%%And Caleb drove thence the three sons of Anak, Sheshai, and Ahiman, and Talmai, the children of Anak.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%15%%And he went up thence to the inhabitants of Debir: and the name of Debir before was Kirjath-sepher.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%16%%And Caleb said, He that smiteth Kirjath-sepher, and taketh it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter for a wife.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%17%%And Othniel the son of Kenaz, the brother of Caleb, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter for a wife.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%18%%And it came to pass, as she came to him, that she moved him to ask of her father a field. And she lighted off her ass; and Caleb said to her, What wouldst thou?
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%19%%Who answered, Give me a blessing; for thou hast given me a south land, give me also springs of water. And he gave her the upper springs, and the nether springs.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%20%%This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%21%%And the uttermost cities of the tribe of the children of Judah towards the border of Edom southward were Kabzeel, and Eder, and Jagur,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%22%%And Kinah, and Dimonah, and Adadah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%23%%And Kedesh, and Hazor, and Ithnan,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%24%%Ziph, and Telem, and Bealoth,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%25%%And Hazor, Hadattah, and Kerioth, and Hezron, which is Hazor,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%26%%Aman, and Shema, and Moladah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%27%%And Hazar-gaddah, and Heshmon, and Beth-palet,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%28%%And Hazar-shual, and Beer-sheba, and Bizjothjah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%29%%Baalah, and Iim, and Azem,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%30%%And Eltolad, and Chesil, and Hormah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%31%%And Ziglag, and Madmannah, and Sansannah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%32%%And Lebaoth, and Shilhim, and Ain, and Rimmon: all the cities are twenty and nine, with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%33%%And in the valley, Eshtaol, and Zoreah, and Ashnah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%34%%And Zanoah, and En-gannim, Tappuah, and Enam,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%35%%Jarmuth, and Adullam, Socoh, and Azekah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%36%%And Sharaim, and Adithaim, and Gederah, and Gederothaim; fourteen cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%37%%Zenan, and Hadashah, and Migdalgad,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%38%%And Dilean, and Mizpeh, and Joktheel,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%39%%Lachish, and Bozkath, and Eglon,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%40%%And Cabbon, and Lahman, and Kithlish,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%41%%And Gederoth, Beth-dagon, and Naamah, and Makkedah; sixteen cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%42%%Libnah, and Ether, and Ashan,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%43%%And Jiphtah, and Ashnah, and Nezib,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%44%%And Keilah, and Achzib, and Mareshah; nine cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%45%%Ekron, with her towns and her villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%46%%From Ekron even to the sea, all that lay near Ashdod, with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%47%%Ashdod, with her towns and her villages; Gaza, with her towns and her villages, to the river of Egypt, and the great sea, and its border:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%48%%And in the mountains, Shamir, and Jattir, and Socoh,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%49%%And Dannah, and Kirjath-sannah, which is Debir,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%50%%And Anab, and Eshtemoh, and Anim,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%51%%And Goshen, and Holon, and Giloh: eleven cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%52%%Arab, and Dumah, and Eshean,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%53%%And Janum, and Beth-tappuah, and Aphekah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%54%%And Humtah, and Kirjath-arba (which is Hebron) and Zior; nine cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%55%%Maon, Carmel, and Ziph, and Juttah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%56%%And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%57%%Cain, Gibeah, and Timnah; ten cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%58%%Halhul, Beth-zur, and Gedor,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%59%%And Maarath, and Beth-anoth, and Eltekon; six cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%60%%Kirjath-baal (which is Kirjath-jearim) and Rabbah; two cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%61%%In the wilderness, Beth-arabah, Middin, and Secacah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%62%%And Nibshan, and the city of Salt, and En-gedi; six cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%15%%63%%As for the Jebusites, the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the children of Judah could not expel them: but the Jebusites dwell with the children of Judah at Jerusalem to this day.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%1%%And the lot of the children of Joseph fell from Jordan by Jericho, to the water of Jericho on the east, to the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho throughout mount Beth-el,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%2%%And goeth out from Beth-el to Luz, and passeth along to the borders of Archi to Ataroth,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%3%%And goeth down westward to the border of Japhleti, to the border of Beth-horon the nether, and to Gezer: and the limits of it are at the sea.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%4%%So the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%5%%And the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families was thus: even the border of their inheritance on the east side was Ataroth-adar, to Beth-horon the upper:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%6%%And the border went out towards the sea to Michmethah on the north side; and the border went about eastward to Taanath-shiloh, and passed by it on the east to Janohah;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%7%%And it went down from Janohah to Ataroth, and to Naarath, and came to Jericho, and terminated at Jordan.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%8%%The border went out from Tappuah westward to the river Kanah; and the limits of it were at the sea. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Ephraim by their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%9%%And the separate cities for the children of Ephraim were among the inheritance of the children of Manasseh, all the cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%16%%10%%And they did not expel the Canaanites that dwelt in Gezer: but the Canaanites dwell among the Ephraimites to this day, and serve under tribute.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%1%%There was also a lot for the tribe of Manasseh; for he was the first-born of Joseph; to wit, for Machir the first-born of Manasseh, the father of Gilead: because he was a man of war, therefore he had Gilead and Bashan.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%2%%There was also a lot for the rest of the children of Manasseh by their families; for the children of Abiezer, and for the children of Helek, and for the children of Asriel, and for the children of Shechem, and for the children of Hepher, and for the children of Shemida: these were the male children of Manasseh the son of Joseph by their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%3%%But Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, had no sons, but daughters: and these are the names of his daughters, Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%4%%And they came near before Eleazar the priest, and before Joshua the son of Nun, and before the princes, saying, The LORD commanded Moses to give us an inheritance among our brethren: therefore according to the commandment of the LORD he gave them an inheritance among the brethren of their father.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%5%%And there fell ten portions to Manasseh, besides the land of Gilead and Bashan, which were on the other side of Jordan;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%6%%Because the daughters of Manasseh had an inheritance among his sons: and the rest of Manasseh's sons had the land of Gilead.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%7%%And the border of Manasseh was from Asher to Michmethah, that lieth before Shechem; and the border went along on the right hand to the inhabitants of En-tappuah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%8%%Now Manasseh had the land of Tappuah: but Tappuah on the border of Manasseh belonged to the children of Ephraim;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%9%%And the border descended to the river Kanah, southward of the river. These cities of Ephraim are among the cities of Manasseh: the border of Manasseh also was on the north side of the river, and the limits of it were at the sea:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%10%%Southward it was Ephraim's, and northward it was Manasseh's, and the sea is his border; and they met together in Asher on the north, and in Issachar on the east.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%11%%And Manasseh had in Issachar and in Asher Beth-shean and its towns, and Ibleam and its towns, and the inhabitants of Dor and its towns, and the inhabitants of En-dor and its towns, and the inhabitants of Tanach and its towns, and the inhabitants of Megiddo and its towns, even three countries.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%12%%Yet the children of Manasseh could not expel the inhabitants of those cities; but the Canaanites would dwell in that land.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%13%%Yet it came to pass, when the children of Israel had become strong, that they subjected the Canaanites to tribute; but did not utterly expel them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%14%%And the children of Joseph spoke to Joshua, saying, Why hast thou given me but one lot and one portion to inherit, seeing I am a great people, forasmuch as the LORD hath hitherto blessed me?
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%15%%And Joshua answered them, If thou art a great people, then go up to the wood, and cut down for thyself there in the land of the Perizzites and of the giants, if mount Ephraim is too narrow for thee.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%16%%And the children of Joseph said, The hill is not enough for us: and all the Canaanites that dwell in the land of the valley have chariots of iron, both they who are of Beth-shean and its towns, and they who are of the valley of Jezreel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%17%%And Joshua spoke to the house of Joseph, even to Ephraim and to Manasseh, saying, Thou art a great people, and hast great power: thou shalt not have one lot only:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%17%%18%%But the mountain shall be thine; for it is a wood, and thou shalt cut it down: and the limits of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive out the Canaanites, though they have iron chariots, and though they are strong.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%1%%And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there: and the land was subdued before them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%2%%And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%3%%And Joshua said to the children of Israel, How long are ye slack to go to possess the land which the LORD God of your fathers hath given you?
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%4%%Select from among you three men for each tribe: and I will send them, and they shall rise, and go through the land, and describe it according to the inheritance of them, and they shall come again to me.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%5%%And they shall divide it into seven parts: Judah shall abide in their border on the south, and the house of Joseph shall abide in their borders on the north.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%6%%Ye shall therefore describe the land in seven parts, and bring the description hither to me, that I may cast lots for you here before the LORD our God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%7%%But the Levites have no part among you; for the priesthood of the LORD is their inheritance. And Gad, and Reuben, and half the tribe of Manasseh, have received their inheritance beyond Jordan on the east, which Moses the servant of the LORD gave them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%8%%And the men arose, and departed: and Joshua charged them that went to describe the land, saying, Go, and walk through the land, and describe it, and come again to me, that I may here cast lots for you before the LORD in Shiloh.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%9%%And the men went and passed through the land, and described it by cities in seven parts in a book, and came again, to Joshua to the host at Shiloh.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%10%%And Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before the LORD: and there Joshua divided the land to the children of Israel according to their divisions.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%11%%And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families: and the border of their lot came forth between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%12%%And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the limits of it were at the wilderness of Beth-aven.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%13%%And the border went over from thence towards Luz, to the side of Luz (which is Beth-el) southward; and the border descended to Ataroth-adar, near the hill that lieth on the south side of the nether Beth-horon.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%14%%And the border was drawn thence, and compassed the corner of the sea southward, from the hill that lieth before Beth-horon southward; and the limits of it were at Kirjath-baal (which is Kirjath-jearim) a city of the children of Judah. This was the west quarter.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%15%%And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjah-jearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%16%%And the border came down to the end of the mountain that lieth before the valley of the son of Hinnom, and which is in the valley of the giants on the north, and descended to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of Jebusi on the south, and descended to En-rogel,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%17%%And was drawn from the north, and went forth to En-shemesh, and went forth towards Geliloth, which is over against the going up of Adummim, and descended to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%18%%And passed along towards the side over against Arabah northward, and went down to Arabah:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%19%%And the border passed along to the side of Beth-hoglah northward: and the limits of the border were at the north bay of the salt sea at the south end of Jordan. This was the south border.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%20%%And Jordan was the border of it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the limits of it round about, according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%21%%Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, according to their families, were Jericho, and Beth-hoglah, and the valley of Keziz,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%22%%And Beth-arabah, and Zemaraim, and Beth-el,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%23%%And Avim, and Parah, and Ophrah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%24%%And Chephar-haamonai, and Ophni, and Gaba; twelve cities with their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%25%%Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%26%%And Mizpeh, and Chephirah, and Mozah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%27%%And Rekem, and Irpeel, and Taralah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%18%%28%%And Zelah, Eleph, and Jebusi, (which is Jerusalem) Gibeath, and Kirjath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%1%%And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families: and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%2%%And they had in their inheritance, Beer-sheba, and Sheba, and Moladah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%3%%And Hazar-shual, and Balah, and Azem,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%4%%And Eltolad, and Bethul, and Hormah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%5%%And Ziklag, and Beth-marcaboth, and Hazar-susah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%6%%And Beth-lebaoth, and Sheruhen; thirteen cities and their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%7%%Ain, Remmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%8%%And all the villages that were around these cities to Baalath-beer, Ramath of the south. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%9%%Out of the portion of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon: for the part of the children of Judah was too much for them: therefore the children of Simeon had their inheritance within the inheritance of them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%10%%And the third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families: and the border of their inheritance was to Sarid:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%11%%And their border went up towards the sea, and Maralah, and reached to Dabbasheth, and reached to the river that is before Jokneam,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%12%%And turned from Sarid eastward, towards the sun-rising, to the border of Chisloth-tabor, and then goeth out to Daberath, and goeth up to Japhia,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%13%%And from thence passeth along on the east to Gittah-hepher, to Ittah-kazin, and goeth out to Remmon-methoar to Neah;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%14%%And the border compasseth it on the north side to Hannathon: and the limits of it are in the valley of Jiphthah-el:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%15%%And Kattath, and Nahallal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Beth-lehem; twelve cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%16%%This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%17%%And the fourth lot came out to Issachar, for the children of Issachar according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%18%%And their border was towards Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%19%%And Hapharaim, and Shihon, and Anaharath,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%20%%And Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%21%%And Remeth, and En-gannim, and En-haddah, and Beth-pazzez;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%22%%And the border reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Beth-shemesh, and the limits of their border were at Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%23%%This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%24%%And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%25%%And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%26%%And Alammelech, and Amad, and Misheal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihor-libnath;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%27%%And turneth towards the sun-rising to Beth-dagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Jiphthah-el towards the north side of Beth-emek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%28%%And Hebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah, even to great Zidon;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%29%%And then the border turneth to Ramah, and to the strong city Tyre; and the border turneth to Hosah: and the limits of it are at the sea from the coast to Achzib:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%30%%Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%31%%This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families, these cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%32%%The sixth lot came out to the children of Naphtali, even for the children of Naphtali according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%33%%And their border was from Heleph, from Allon to Zaanannim, and Adami, Nekeb, and Jabneel, to Lakum; and the limits thereof were at Jordan:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%34%%And then the border turneth westward to Aznoth-tabor, and goeth out from thence to Hukkok, and reacheth to Zebulun on the south side, and reacheth to Asher on the west side, and to Judah upon Jordan towards the sun-rising.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%35%%And the fortified cities are Ziddim, Zer, and Hammath, Rakkath, and Chinnereth,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%36%%And Adamah, and Ramah, and Hazor,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%37%%And Kedesh, and Edrei, and En-hazor,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%38%%And Iron, and Migdal-el, Horem, and Beth-anath, and Beth-shemesh; nineteen cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%39%%This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Naphtali according to their families, the cities and their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%40%%And the seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%41%%And the border of their inheritance was Zorah, and Eshtaol, and Ir-shemesh,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%42%%And Shaalabbim, and Ajalon, and Jethlah,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%43%%And Elon, and Thimnathah, and Ekron,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%44%%And Eltekeh, and Gibbethon, and Baalath,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%45%%And Jehud, and Bene-berak, and Gath-rimmon,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%46%%And Me-jarkon, and Rakkon, with the border before Japho.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%47%%And the border of the children of Dan, went out too little for them: therefore the children of Dan went up to fight against Leshem, and took it, and smote it with the edge of the sword, and possessed it, and dwelt in it, and called Leshem, Dan, after the name of Dan their father.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%48%%This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families, these cities with their villages.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%49%%When they had made an end of dividing the land for inheritance by their borders, the children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun among them:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%50%%According to the word of the LORD they gave him the city which he asked, even Timnath-serah in mount Ephraim: and he built the city, and dwelt in it.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%19%%51%%These are the inheritances which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel, divided for an inheritance by lot in Shiloh before the LORD, at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation. So they made an end of dividing the country.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%1%%The LORD also spoke to Joshua, saying,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%2%%Speak to the children of Israel, saying, Appoint for you cities of refuge, of which I spoke to you by the hand of Moses:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%3%%That the slayer that killeth any person unawares and ignorantly, may flee thither: and they shall be your refuge from the avenger of blood.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%4%%And when he that doth flee to one of those cities shall stand at the entering of the gate of the city, and shall declare his cause in the ears of the elders of that city, they shall take him into the city to them, and give him a place, that he may dwell among them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%5%%And if the avenger of blood shall pursue him, then they shall not deliver the slayer into his hand; because he smote his neighbor ignorantly, and had not hated him before.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%6%%And he shall dwell in that city, until he shall stand before the congregation for judgment, and until the death of the high-priest that shall be in those days: then shall the slayer return, and come to his own city, and to his own house, to the city from whence he fled.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%7%%And they appointed Kedesh in Galilee in mount Naphtali, and Shechem in mount Ephraim, and Kirjath-arba, (which is Hebron) in the mountain of Judah.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%8%%And on the other side of Jordan by Jericho eastward, they assigned Bezer in the wilderness upon the plain out of the tribe of Reuben, and Ramoth in Gilead out of the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan out of the tribe of Manasseh.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%20%%9%%These were the cities appointed for all the children of Israel, and for the stranger sojourning among them, that whoever should kill any person unawares might flee thither, and not die by the hand of the avenger of blood, until he stood before the congregation.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%1%%Then came near the heads of the fathers of the Levites to Eleazar the priest, and to Joshua the son of Nun, and to the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%2%%And they spoke to them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses to give us cities to dwell in, with their suburbs for our cattle.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%3%%And the children of Israel gave to the Levites out of their inheritance, at the commandment of the LORD, these cities and their suburbs.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%4%%And the lot came out for the families of the Kohathites: and the children of Aaron the priest, who were of the Levites, had by lot out of the tribe of Judah, and out of the tribe of Simeon, and out of the tribe of Benjamin, thirteen cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%5%%And the rest of the children of Kohath had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, and out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, ten cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%6%%And the children of Gershon had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%7%%The children of Merari by their families had out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%8%%And the children of Israel gave by lot to the Levites these cities with their suburbs, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%9%%And they gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are here mentioned by name,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%10%%Which the children of Aaron, being of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi, had: for theirs was the first lot.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%11%%And they gave them the city of Arba the father of Anak (which city is Hebron) in the hill-country of Judah, with its suburbs round it.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%12%%But the fields of the city, and its villages, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%13%%Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest, Hebron with its suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%14%%And Jattir with its suburbs, and Eshtemoa with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%15%%And Holon with its suburbs, and Debir with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%16%%And Ain with its suburbs, and Juttah with its suburbs, and Beth-shemesh with its suburbs; nine cities out of those two tribes.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%17%%And out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with its suburbs, Geba with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%18%%Anathoth with its suburbs, and Almon with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%19%%All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%20%%And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites who remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%21%%For they gave them Shechem with its suburbs in mount Ephraim, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Gezer with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%22%%And Kibzaim with its suburbs, and Beth-horon with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%23%%And out of the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with its suburbs, Gibbethon with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%24%%Ajalon with its suburbs, Gath-rimmon with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%25%%And out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Taanach with its suburbs, and Gath-rimmon with its suburbs; two cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%26%%All the cities were ten with their suburbs, for the families of the children of Kohath that remained.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%27%%And to the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the other half-tribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with its suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer, and Beesh-terah with its suburbs; two cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%28%%And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishon with its suburbs, Dabareh with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%29%%Jarmuth with its suburbs, En-gannim with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%30%%And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with its suburbs, Abdon with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%31%%Helkath with its suburbs, and Rehob with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%32%%And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Hammoth-dor with its suburbs, and Kartan with its suburbs; three cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%33%%All the cities of the Gershonites, according to their families, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%34%%And to the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with its suburbs, and Kartah with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%35%%Dimnah with its suburbs, Nahalal with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%36%%And out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with its suburbs, and Jahazah with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%37%%Kedemoth with its suburbs, and Mephaath with its suburbs; four cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%38%%And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its suburbs to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Mahanaim with its suburbs,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%39%%Heshbon with its suburbs, Jazer with its suburbs; four cities in all.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%40%%So all the cities for the children of Merari by their families, which were remaining of the families of the Levites, were by their lot twelve cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%41%%All the cities of the Levites within the possession of the children of Israel were forty and eight cities with their suburbs.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%42%%These cities were every one with their suburbs around them. Thus were all these cities.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%43%%And the LORD gave to Israel all the land which he swore to give to their fathers: and they possessed it, and dwelt in it.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%44%%And the LORD gave them rest on all sides, according to all that he swore to their fathers: and there stood not a man of all their enemies before them; the LORD delivered all their enemies into their hand.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%21%%45%%There failed not aught of any good thing which the LORD had spoken to the house of Israel; all came to pass.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%1%%Then Joshua called the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%2%%And said to them, Ye have kept all that Moses the servant of the LORD commanded you, and have obeyed my voice in all that I commanded you:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%3%%Ye have not left your brethren these many days to this day, but have kept the charge of the commandment of the LORD your God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%4%%And now the LORD your God hath given rest to your brethren, as he promised them: therefore now return ye, and go to your tents, and to the land of your possession, which Moses the servant of the LORD gave you on the other side of Jordan.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%5%%But take diligent heed to perform the commandment and the law, which Moses the servant of the LORD charged you, to love the LORD your God, and to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and to cleave to him, and to serve him with all your heart, and with all your soul.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%6%%So Joshua blessed them and sent them away; and they went to their tents.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%7%%Now to the one half of the tribe of Manasseh Moses had given possession in Bashan: but to the other half of it gave Joshua among their brethren on this side of Jordan westward. And when Joshua sent them away also to their tents, then he blessed them,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%8%%And he spoke to them, saying, Return with much riches to your tents, and with very many cattle, with silver, and with gold, and with brass, and with iron, and with very much raiment: divide the spoil of your enemies with your brethren.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%9%%And the children of Reuben, and the children of Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh returned, and departed from the children of Israel out of Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan, to go to the country of Gilead, to the land of their possession, of which they were possessed, according to the word of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%10%%And when they came to the borders of Jordan, that are in the land of Canaan, the children of Reuben, and the children of Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh built there an altar by Jordan, a great altar to the sight.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%11%%And the children of Israel heard it said, Behold, the children of Reuben, and the children of Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh, have built an altar over against the land of Canaan, in the borders of Jordan, at the passage of the children of Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%12%%And when the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled at Shiloh, to go up to war against them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%13%%And the children of Israel sent to the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half-tribe of Manasseh into the land of Gilead, Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%14%%And with him ten princes, of each chief house a prince throughout all the tribes of Israel; and each one was a head of the house of their fathers among the thousands of Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%15%%And they came to the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half-tribe of Manasseh, to the land of Gilead, and they spoke with them, saying,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%16%%Thus saith the whole congregation of the LORD, What trespass is this that ye have committed against the God of Israel, to turn away this day from following the LORD, in that ye have built you an altar, that ye might rebel this day against the LORD?
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%17%%Is the iniquity of Peor too little for us, from which we are not cleansed until this day, although there was a plague in the congregation of the LORD,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%18%%But that ye must turn away this day from following the LORD? and it will be, seeing ye rebel to-day against the LORD, that to-morrow he will be wroth with the whole congregation of Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%19%%Not withstanding, if the land of your possession is unclean, then pass ye over to the land of the possession of the LORD, in which the LORD'S tabernacle dwelleth, and take possession among us: but rebel not against the LORD, nor rebel against us, in building you an altar besides the altar of the LORD our God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%20%%Did not Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the accursed thing, and wrath fall on all the congregation of Israel? and that man perished not alone in his iniquity.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%21%%Then the children of Reuben, and the children of Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh answered, and said to the heads of the thousands of Israel,
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%22%%The LORD God of gods, the LORD God of gods, he knoweth, and Israel he shall know; if it is in rebellion, or if in transgression against the LORD, (save us not this day,)
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%23%%That we have built us an altar to turn from following the LORD, or if to offer on it burnt-offering, or meat-offering, or if to offer peace-offerings on it, let the LORD himself require it;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%24%%And if we have not rather done it for fear of this thing, saying, In time to come your children may speak to our children, saying, What have ye to do with the LORD God of Israel?
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%25%%For the LORD hath made Jordan a boundary between us and you, ye children of Reuben and children of Gad; ye have no part in the LORD. So shall your children make our children cease from fearing the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%26%%Therefore we said, Let us now prepare to build us an altar, not for burnt-offering, nor for sacrifice:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%27%%But that it may be a witness between us, and you, and our generations after us, that we may do the service of the LORD before him with our burnt-offerings, and with our sacrifices, and with our peace-offerings; that your children may not say to our children in time to come, Ye have no part in the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%28%%Therefore said we, that it shall be, when they shall so say to us or to our generations in time to come, that we may say, Behold the pattern of the altar of the LORD, which our fathers made, not for burnt-offerings, nor for sacrifices; but it is a witness between us and you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%29%%Far be it from us that we should rebel against the LORD, and turn this day from following the LORD, to build an altar for burnt-offerings, for meat-offerings, or for sacrifices, besides the altar of the LORD our God that is before his tabernacle.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%30%%And when Phinehas the priest, and the princes of the congregation, and heads of the thousands of Israel who were with him, heard the words that the children of Reuben, and the children of Gad, and the children of Manasseh spoke, it pleased them.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%31%%And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said to the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the children of Manasseh, This day we perceive that the LORD is among us, because ye have not committed this trespass against the LORD: now ye have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%32%%And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, and the princes, returned from the children of Reuben, and from the children of Gad, from the land of Gilead, to the land of Canaan, to the children of Israel, and brought them word again.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%33%%And the thing pleased the children of Israel; and the children of Israel blessed God, and did not intend to go up against them in battle, to destroy the land in which the children of Reuben and Gad dwelt.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%22%%34%%And the children of Reuben and the children of Gad called the altar Ed: for it shall be a witness between us that the LORD is God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%1%%And it came to pass, a long time after that the LORD had given rest to Israel from all their enemies on all sides, that Joshua became old and advanced in age.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%2%%And Joshua called for all Israel, and for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said to them, I am old and advanced in age:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%3%%And ye have seen all that the LORD your God hath done to all these nations because of you; for the LORD your God is he that hath fought for you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%4%%Behold, I have divided to you by lot these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even to the great sea westward.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%5%%And the LORD your God, he shall expel them from before you, and drive them from your sight; and ye shall possess their land, as the LORD your God hath promised to you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%6%%Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that ye turn not aside from it to the right hand or to the left;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%7%%That ye come not among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow yourselves to them:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%8%%But cleave to the LORD your God, as ye have done to this day.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%9%%For the LORD hath driven out from before you great nations and strong: but as for you, no man hath been able to stand before you to this day.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%10%%One man of you shall chase a thousand: for the LORD your God, he it is that fighteth for you, as he hath promised you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%11%%Take good heed therefore to yourselves, that ye love the LORD your God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%12%%Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave to the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and associate with them, and they with you:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%13%%Know for a certainty that the LORD your God will no more drive out any of these nations from before you; but they shall be snares and traps to you, and scourges in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%14%%And behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth; and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the LORD your God spoke concerning you: all are come to pass to you, and not one thing hath failed of it.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%15%%Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good things are come upon you, which the LORD your God promised you; so shall the LORD bring upon you all evil things, until he hath destroyed you from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%23%%16%%When ye have transgressed the covenant of the LORD your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given to you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%1%%And Joshua convened all the tribes of Israel to Shechem, and called for the elders of Israel, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers; and they presented themselves before God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%2%%And Joshua said to all the people, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Your fathers dwelt on the other side of the flood in old time, even Terah, the father of Abraham, and the father of Nahor: and they served other gods.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%3%%And I took your father Abraham from the other side of the flood, and led him throughout all the land of Canaan, and multiplied his seed, and gave him Isaac.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%4%%And I gave to Isaac Jacob and Esau: and I gave to Esau mount Seir, to possess it; but Jacob and his children went down into Egypt.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%5%%I sent Moses also and Aaron, and I plagued Egypt, according to that which I did among them: and afterward I brought you out.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%6%%And I brought your fathers out of Egypt: and ye came to the sea; and the Egyptians pursued after your fathers with chariots and horsemen to the Red sea.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%7%%And when they cried to the LORD, he put darkness between you and the Egyptians, and brought the sea upon them, and covered them; and your eyes have seen what I have done in Egypt: and ye dwelt in the wilderness a long season.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%8%%And I brought you into the land of the Amorites, who dwelt on the other side of Jordan, and they fought with you: and I gave them into your hand, that ye might possess their land; and I destroyed them from before you.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%9%%Then Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, arose and warred against Israel, and sent and called Balaam the son of Beor to curse you:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%10%%But I would not hearken to Balaam; therefore he blessed you still: so I delivered you out of his hand.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%11%%And ye went over Jordan, and came to Jericho: and the men of Jericho fought against you, the Amorites, and the Perizzites, and the Canaanites, and the Hittites, and the Girgashites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites, and I delivered them into your hand.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%12%%And I sent the hornet before you, which drove them out from before you, even the two kings of the Amorites; but not with thy sword, nor with thy bow.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%13%%And I have given you a land for which ye did not labor, and cities which ye built not, and ye dwell in them; of the vineyards and olive-yards which ye planted not do ye eat.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%14%%Now therefore fear the LORD, and serve him in sincerity and in truth; and put away the gods which your fathers served on the other side of the flood, and in Egypt; and serve ye the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%15%%And if it seemeth evil to you to serve the LORD, choose you this day whom ye will serve, whether the gods which your fathers served that were on the other side of the flood, or the gods of the Amorites in whose land ye dwell: but as for me and my house, we will serve the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%16%%And the people answered, and said, Be it far from us that we should forsake the LORD, to serve other gods;
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%17%%For the LORD our God, he it is that brought us, and our fathers, out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage, and who did those great signs in our sight, and preserved us in all the way in which we went, and among all the people through whom we passed:
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%18%%And the LORD drove out from before us all the people, even the Amorites who dwelt in the land: therefore will we also serve the LORD; for he is our God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%19%%And Joshua said to the people, Ye cannot serve the LORD: for he is a holy God; he is a jealous God; he will not forgive your transgressions, nor your sins.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%20%%If ye forsake the LORD, and serve strange gods, then he will turn and do you hurt, and consume you, after that he hath done you good.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%21%%And the people said to Joshua, No; but we will serve the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%22%%And Joshua said to the people, Ye are witnesses against yourselves that ye have chosen you the LORD, to serve him. And they said, We are witnesses.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%23%%Now therefore put away (said he) the strange gods which are among you, and incline your heart to the LORD God of Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%24%%And the people said to Joshua, The LORD our God will we serve, and his voice will we obey.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%25%%So Joshua made a covenant with the people that day, and set them a statute and an ordinance in Shechem.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%26%%And Joshua wrote these words in the book of the law of God, and took a great stone, and set it up there under an oak that was by the sanctuary of the LORD.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%27%%And Joshua said to all the people, Behold, this stone shall be a witness to us; for it hath heard all the words of the LORD which he spoke to us, it shall be therefore a witness to you, lest ye deny your God.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%28%%So Joshua let the people depart, every man to his inheritance.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%29%%And it came to pass after these things, that Joshua the son of Nun the servant of the LORD died, being a hundred and ten years old.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%30%%And they buried him in the border of his inheritance in Timnath-serah, which is in mount Ephraim, on the north side of the hill of Gaash.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%31%%And Israel served the LORD all the days of Joshua, and all the days of the elders that outlived Joshua, and who had known all the works of the LORD that he had done for Israel.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%32%%And the bones of Joseph which the children of Israel brought out of Egypt, they buried in Shechem, in a parcel of ground which Jacob bought of the sons of Hamor the father of Shechem for a hundred pieces of silver; and it became the inheritance of the children of Joseph.
1000005%%Joshua%%OT%%24%%33%%And Eleazar the son of Aaron died; and they buried him in a hill that pertained to Phinehas his son, which was given him in mount Ephraim.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%1%%Now after the death of Joshua it came to pass, that the children of Israel asked the LORD, saying, Who shall go up for us against the Canaanites first to fight against them?
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%2%%And the LORD said, Judah shall go up: behold, I have delivered the land into his hand.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%3%%And Judah said to Simeon his brother, Come up with me into my lot, that we may fight against the Canaanites; and I likewise will go with thee into thy lot. So Simeon went with him.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%4%%And Judah went up, and the LORD delivered the Canaanites and the Perizzites into their hand: and they slew of them in Bezek ten thousand men.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%5%%And they found Adoni-bezek in Bezek: and they fought against him, and they slew the Canaanites and the Perizzites.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%6%%But Adoni-bezek fled; and they pursued him, and caught him, and cut off his thumbs and his great toes.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%7%%And Adoni-bezek said, seventy kings, having their thumbs and their great toes cut off, gathered their food under my table; as I have done, so God hath requited me. And they brought him to Jerusalem, and there he died.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%8%%(Now the children of Judah had fought against Jerusalem, and had taken it, and smitten it with the edge of the sword, and set the city on fire.)
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%9%%And afterward the children of Judah went down to fight against the Canaanites that dwelt on the mountain, and in the south, and in the valley.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%10%%And Judah went against the Canaanites that dwelt in Hebron: (now the name of Hebron before was Kirjath-arba:) and they slew Sheshai, and Ahiman, and Talmai.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%11%%And from thence he went against the inhabitants of Debir: and the name of Debir before was Kirjath-sepher:
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%12%%And Caleb said, He that smiteth Kirjath-sepher, and taketh it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter for a wife.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%13%%And Othniel the son of Kenaz, Caleb's younger brother, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter for a wife.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%14%%And it came to pass, when she came to him, that she moved him to ask of her father a field: and she lighted from off her ass; and Caleb said to her, What wilt thou?
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%15%%And she said to him, Give me a blessing: for thou hast given me a south land; give me also springs of water. And Caleb gave her the upper springs, and the nether springs.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%16%%And the children of the Kenite, Moses's father-in-law, went up out of the city of palm-trees with the children of Judah into the wilderness of Judah, which lieth in the south of Arad; and they went and dwelt among the people.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%17%%And Judah went with Simeon his brother, and they slew the Canaanites that inhabited Zephath, and utterly destroyed it. And the name of the city was called Hormah.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%18%%Also Judah took Gaza with its border, and Askelon with its border, and Ekron with its border.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%19%%And the LORD was with Judah; and he drove out the inhabitants of the mountain; but could not drive out the inhabitants of the valley, because they had chariots of iron.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%20%%And they gave Hebron to Caleb, as Moses said: and he expelled thence the three sons of Anak.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%21%%And the children of Benjamin did not drive out the Jebusites that inhabited Jerusalem; but the Jebusites dwell with the children of Benjamin in Jerusalem to this day.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%22%%And the house of Joseph, they also went up against Beth-el: and the LORD was with them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%23%%And the house of Joseph sent to explore Beth-el. Now the name of the city before was Luz.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%24%%And the spies saw a man coming out of the city, and they said to him, Show us, we pray thee, the entrance into the city, and we will show thee mercy.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%25%%And when he showed them the entrance into the city, they smote the city with the edge of the sword: but they let go the man and all his family.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%26%%And the man went into the land of the Hittites, and built a city, and called the name of it Luz: which is its name to this day.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%27%%Neither did Manasseh expel the inhabitants of Beth-shean and its towns, nor Tanach and its towns, nor the inhabitants of Dor and its towns, nor the inhabitants of Ibleam and its towns, nor the inhabitants of Megiddo and its towns; but the Canaanites would dwell in that land.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%28%%And it came to pass when Israel was strong, that they subjected the Canaanites to tribute, and did not utterly expel them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%29%%Neither did Ephraim expel the Canaanites that dwelt in Gezer; but the Canaanites dwelt in Gezer among them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%30%%Neither did Zebulun expel the inhabitants of Kitron, nor the inhabitants of Nahalol; but the Canaanites dwelt among them, and became tributaries.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%31%%Neither did Asher expel the inhabitants of Accho, nor the inhabitants of Zidon, nor of Ahlab, nor of Achzib, nor of Helbah, nor of Aphik, nor of Rehob:
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%32%%But the Asherites dwelt among the Canaanites, the inhabitants of the land: for they did not expel them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%33%%Neither did Naphtali expel the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh, nor the inhabitants of Beth-anath; but he dwelt among the Canaanites, the inhabitants of the land: nevertheless, the inhabitants of Beth-shemesh and of Beth-anath became tributaries to them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%34%%And the Amorites forced the children of Dan to the mountain: for they would not suffer them to come down to the valley:
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%35%%But the Amorites would dwell in mount Heres in Ajalon, and in Shaalbim: yet the hand of the house of Joseph prevailed, so that they became tributaries.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%1%%36%%And the border of the Amorites was from the ascent to Akrabbim, from the rock, and upward.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%1%%And an angel of the LORD came up from Gilgal to Bochim, and said, I made you to depart from Egypt, and have brought you to the land which I swore to your fathers; and I said, I will never break my covenant with you.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%2%%And ye shall make no league with the inhabitants of this land; ye shall throw down their altars: but ye have not obeyed my voice: why have ye done this?
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%3%%Wherefore I also said, I will not drive them out from before you; but they shall be as thorns in your sides, and their gods shall be a snare to you.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%4%%And it came to pass, when the angel of the LORD spoke these words to all the children of Israel, that the people lifted up their voice, and wept.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%5%%And they called the name of that place Bochim: and they sacrificed there to the LORD.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%6%%And when Joshua had let the people go, the children of Israel went every man to his inheritance to possess the land.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%7%%And the people served the LORD all the days of Joshua, and all the days of the elders that outlived Joshua, who had seen all the great works of the LORD, that he did for Israel.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%8%%And Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the LORD, died, being a hundred and ten years old.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%9%%And they buried him in the border of his inheritance in Timnath-heres, in the mount of Ephraim, on the north side of the hill Gaash.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%10%%And also all that generation were gathered to their fathers: and there arose another generation after them, which knew not the LORD, nor yet the works which he had done for Israel.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%11%%And the children of Israel did evil in the sight of the LORD, and served Baalim:
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%12%%And they forsook the LORD God of their fathers, who brought them out of the land of Egypt, and followed other gods, of the gods of the people that were around them, and bowed themselves to them, and provoked the LORD to anger.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%13%%And they forsook the LORD, and served Baal and Ashtaroth.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%14%%And the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel, and he delivered them into the hands of spoilers that spoiled them, and he sold them into the hands of their enemies around, so that they could not any longer stand before their enemies.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%15%%Whithersoever they went out, the hand of the LORD was against them for evil, as the LORD had said, and as the LORD had sworn to them: and they were greatly distressed.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%16%%Nevertheless the LORD raised up judges, who delivered them out of the hand of those that spoiled them.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%17%%And yet they would not hearken to their judges, but they went astray after other gods, and bowed themselves to them: they turned quickly out of the way which their fathers walked in, obeying the commandments of the LORD; but they did not so.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%18%%And when the LORD raised up judges for them, then the LORD was with the judge, and delivered them out of the hand of their enemies all the days of the judge: (for the LORD repented because of their groanings by reason of them that oppressed them and burdened them.)
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%19%%And it came to pass, when the judge was dead, that they returned, and corrupted themselves more than their fathers, in following other gods to serve them, and to bow down to them; they ceased not from their own doings, nor from their stubborn way.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%20%%And the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel; and he said, Because that this people hath transgressed my covenant which I commanded their fathers, and have not hearkened to my voice;
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%21%%I also will not henceforth drive out from before them any of the nations which Joshua left when he died:
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%22%%That through them I may prove Israel, whether they will keep the way of the LORD to walk in it, as their fathers kept it, or not.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%2%%23%%Therefore the LORD left those nations, without driving them out speedily, neither did he deliver them into the hand of Joshua.
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%3%%1%%Now these are the nations which the LORD left, to prove Israel by them, (even as many of Israel as had not known all the wars of Canaan;
1000005%%Judges%%OT%%3%%2%%Only that the generations of the children of Israel might know to teach them war, at the least such as before knew nothing of it;)
